programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Sam's girlfriend alleges that her son has stolen a valuable piece of jewellery. Jesse tries to retrieve it, and finds Evan in the midst of packing up to leave town due to a brutal loan shark who is threatening to break his legs unless he steals an 18-wheel truck seemingly filled with black-market liquor. However, they soon learn the vehicle contains something much more dangerous.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Hospital.
programme.desc: A minor nose-bleed sends a panic-stricken Adrian scurrying frantically to the nearest hospital, where he falls foul of a homicidal medic. Guest starring Dan Butler and Charles Durning.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An American football team's doctor is murdered in his home while his wife is tied up in their bedroom, after arguing with a player who blamed him for a drug scandal. Goren and Eames investigate the couple's preacher, who teaches an extremely tolerant and forgiving approach to adultery, and a member of the church's congregation who evades their questioning. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A man involved in a bank heist is killed six months later in a deliberate explosion, and Nichols and Wheeler discover that one of his partners faked his own death. The detectives conclude that one of the robbers has decided not to split the money three ways, and may kill again to further increase their share. Crime drama, starring Jeff Goldblum and Julianne Nicholson.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The disappearance of a federal judge's daughter on the same day as her grandmother dies leads the team to the family's guarded home, where security officers insist the girl never left the property. Convinced she was murdered, Jane searches for the body and concludes the victim was placed in her relative's coffin - prompting him to test his theory on the day of the funeral. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate a death threat, but find themselves in danger when a building explodes. Meanwhile, Lisbon confronts billionaire Walter Mashburn again when they meet during a case. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael gets himself arrested to help the FBI take down a vicious Boston mobster, on the basis that they will reciprocate by furnishing him with more information about the government's investigation into Nate's murder. Meanwhile, Jesse and Pearce run into trouble while investigating a gun sale.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the murder of a successful businessman's brother, who knew a secret concerning their mother's death. The case proves to involve false identities, and the detectives are led down a twisting trail of clues by a wallet in the victim's possession bearing the name Victor Lustig - a notorious Victorian conman. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The chief financial officer of a hedge fund is killed at a banquet where it is rumoured the company is about to be investigated for fraud. The CEO soon checks himself into a psychiatric treatment facility, where patients include one of his major investors, prompting Wheeler and Nichols to investigate the activities of the men's psychiatrist.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate a death threat, but find themselves in danger when a building explodes. Meanwhile, Lisbon confronts billionaire Walter Mashburn again when they meet during a case. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is kidnapped, but as Lisbon and the team go back over his previous cases in search of clues to the abductor's identity, they realise he had numerous enemies, any one of whom might be responsible. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A cook from a US Navy destroyer tells McGee and Gibbs he believes someone is stalking him with the intention of trying to make him poison the crew, and a picture on a stolen phone leads the team to a group testing the psychological effects of surveillance. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons from the Inspector General's office closes in on Ziva as he investigates the death of Ilan Bodnar, the man who killed her father. Guest starring Colin Hanks (Gus Grimly in the Fargo TV series).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates when Navy Seal Chad McBride's wife receives a package from Riyadh in Saudi Arabia containing her husband's severed head, which Palmer discovers contains very high levels of radiation. McBride's commanding officer reveals the soldier was on a top-secret reconnaissance mission and asks Vance not to disclose the details to anyone. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons tries to get Gibbs to take responsibility for the many unnecessary deaths for which he holds the NCIS team accountable.(n)

programme.title: Tyrant
programme.desc: Heavy losses cause Barry to contemplate seeking the palace's support to survive, but doing so would mean ending his exile and risking his life. Meanwhile, Jamal's paranoia continues to build to the point where he begins to question Rami's loyalties, and Sammy plans to give his money to the insurgents battling the Army of the Caliphate in the wake of Abdul's death. Political drama, starring Adam Rayner.(n)

programme.desc: Justin decides to dig up a dinosaur and turn his house into a museum.(n)

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Wilson's new Chug Patrol skills are put to the test, but things go awry when he forgets something important.(n)

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The trains make preparations for the inter Parade - a magical procession that passes through Chuggington.(n)

programme.title: My Pet and Me
programme.desc: In a special winter edition, Ferne and Rory visit Ella to meet her Siberian Huskies, and take them for a walk, brush their coats, and give them food and water.(n)

programme.title: Woolly & Tig: Christmas Magic
programme.desc: The youngster visits her grandad for Christmas, but worries that Santa will not know where she is staying, that there is no snow for his sleigh, and that the house has no chimney.(n)

programme.title: Mouse and Mole at Christmas Time
programme.desc: Snowmole takes Mouse to a land where all his wishes come true - but disaster strikes when his dreams become intertwined with his nightmares.(n)

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: It is the end of the first term at Lowick and Holy Island Schools, and Pandra has a furry surprise for her classmates. Mitchell delivers the Christmas cards, Davey makes a pine cone figure, and everyone remembers their happy times at school.(n)

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Gem's team is made up of some identical twins as Swashbucklers Andy, Rebecca, Cat and Sid tackle a number of physical games and help out Cook and Line with their list of jobs.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Sleepy Hedgehog.
programme.desc: When Peter volunteers to take Mrs Tiggy-Winkle home in time for her winter hibernation, little does he know how much trouble a sleepy hedgehog can be!.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing decides to make Sula a picture with all her favourite things on it, but he accidentally spills glue over the work of art.(n)

programme.title: Something Special: We're All Friends
programme.desc: Justin travels on a narrowboat, while a leaky tap causes problems in Tumble Terrace.(n)

programme.title: Let's Play
programme.desc: Rebecca steps through the magic curtain and arrives in the North Pole on Christmas Eve. She sees if she has what it takes to be an elf, and goes in search of some missing reindeer.(n)

programme.title: Melody
programme.desc: Melody wants her mother to play with her but she is too busy, so the girl stomps off outside - into the cold.(n)

programme.title: Mr Bloom: Here and There
programme.desc: Mr Bloom puts on his wetsuit and joins Abigail and Joe as they have a go at surfing - and they love it so much, they even train on the beach in the rain.(n)

programme.title: I Can Cook with You
programme.desc: Katy Ashworth welcomes children to her kitchen and teaches them how to make Green Parcel Pie.(n)

programme.title: Mister Maker Christmas Around the World
programme.desc: In South Africa, Mister Maker uses an old lolly stick to make a snowman Christmas tree decoration in under a minute, and the Mini Makers of Brazil help build a big picture of a gingerbread house.(n)

programme.title: Charlie and Lola
programme.sub-title: Snow Is My Favourite and My Best.
programme.desc: The duo and their friends have fun in the park on a snowy day.(n)

programme.title: Wussywat the Clumsy Cat
programme.desc: The curious cat breaks the decorations but soon makes some new ones out of string, mistletoe and holly to decorate Ird's tree and celebrate the first day of winter.(n)

programme.title: Mike the Knight
programme.desc: The knight learns to put others before himself when he tries to get back on Santa's good list.(n)

programme.title: Mike the Knight
programme.desc: Mike tries to nurse Santa's sick reindeer back to health in time for presents to be delivered on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: A CBeebies Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A light-hearted adaptation of the classic Christmas novel written by Charles Dickens, featuring several stellar names from children's television down the years, including Derek Griffiths, Dave Benson Phillips and Floella Benjamin.(n)

programme.title: Topsy and Tim's Christmas Eve
programme.desc: The duo decorate the tree on Christmas Eve and wrap presents for their parents.(n)

programme.title: Old Jack's Boat: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: Jack tells the story of his quest to find three Christmas gifts, which turned out to have a huge significance on his life.(n)

programme.title: Sarah & Duck
programme.desc: Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.(n)

programme.title: The Furchester Hotel
programme.desc: Monster Monster visits only one hotel on Monster Monster Day. Elmo really wants it to be The Furchester, but there is a problem when the lift stops working.(n)

programme.title: Katie Morag
programme.sub-title: Katie Morag and the Dancing Class.
programme.desc: Granma Mainland is excited when Katie joins a dancing class, but it seems that ballet is not the youngster's favourite mode of dancing.(n)

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny and Small accidentally spill green soup all over Granny's best shawl, and when they ask Cloud and the froglets to help them clean up the mess, things only end up getting worse.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Abney & Teal
programme.desc: The two friends play in the snow, but cannot find Neep anywhere.(n)

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: The Tombliboos hear Igglepiggle's musical stepping stones and Upsy Daisy's singing.(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.sub-title: Wolf Pack: U-Boats in the Atlantic (1939-1943)
programme.desc: Wolf Pack: U-Boats in the Atlantic (1939-1943). 1943: U-boat wolfpacks stalk the Atlantic, sinking ships on the way to England. On Oct. 17, "the night of the long knives," half the convoy is lost. Capt. Eyton Jones, whose ship was sunk halfway between Brazil and North Africa, recalls how the Germans laughingly retrieved cargo from his ship. Films from national and private sources show U-boats launching torpedoes, storms at sea, crowded lifeboats, aircraft escorts and oil tankers burning at sea. Laurence Olivier is the host(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Red Star: The Soviet Union (1941-1943). This video is part-11 in the 26-volume World at War series that chronicles the history of World War II. The award winning television series, narrated by Laurence Olivier, first aired in 1974. In this volume, the long and dreadful battle between the German and Soviet armies is documented. The death toll to the Russian people stood at over 20 million lives(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Whirlwind: Bombing Germany (September 1939 - April 1944). An account of the Allied air offensive against Germany. Films from national and private sources trace the attempt to disrupt the enemy's production and demoralize the civilian population through strategic bombing. Included is footage of early RAF day and night raids, the bombing of the ports of Lubeck and Rostock, missions by the American 8th Army Air Force, and the bombing of Hamburg and Berlin. Laurence Olivier is the narrator(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Tough Old Gut: Italy (1943-1944). This video is part 13 in the 26-volume World at War series that chronicles the history of World War II. The award-winning series, narrated by Laurence Olivier, first aired on television in 1974. This episode derives its name from a statement made by Winston Churchill that Italy was the "soft underbelly of the crocodile," easy to cut through to reach Germany. The gut of Italy proved to be tougher than originally thought. Archival film footage shows some of the fighting in Italy(n)

With contributions from the couple's friends Alexander Gowrie, Angela Huth and Peter Carrington, alongside constitutional experts and royal biographers.(n)

programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven.(n)

programme.title: One Christmas
programme.desc: A boy is sent to spend Christmas with the alcoholic father he has never met and finds that the festive season helps bring them together. Drama, starring Katharine Hepburn and Henry Winkler.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Canaan
programme.desc: Two boys, one black and the other white, grow up in a racially divided Texas community in the 1960s. The pair take an instant dislike to each other, but their families are determined to end the conflict by forcing them to spend time together. The youngsters grow to become firm friends, but the tension among their neighbours is harder to resolve. Drama, with Jaishon Fisher and Zak Ludwig.(n)

programme.title: A Grandpa for Christmas
programme.desc: An elderly actor who is happiest with his own company unexpectedly ends up having to care for his grand-daughter over Christmas when her mother is hospitalised in a car crash. Although the pair find it hard to get along at first, they eventually bond while working on a school pageant. Family comedy, starring Ernest Borgnine, Juliette Goglia and Katherine Helmond.(n)

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy enters an essay-writing competition, pleading for a new husband for his mother. When their story becomes a national sensation, she is inundated with marriage proposals - and is torn over whether to accept an offer from a wealthy man she does not love. Romantic drama, starring Gail O'Grady, Jimmy `Jax' Pinchak and Robert Mailhouse.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Santas
programme.desc: Santa's son Nick and single mother Beth tie the knot on Christmas Eve - but married life takes an unexpected turn once the couple start to run the family business after Santa's retirement. Fantasy comedy, a sequel to Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus, starring Steve Guttenberg, Crystal Bernard, Marcia Ann Burrs and Roark Critchlow.(n)

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.(n)

programme.title: Secret Santa
programme.desc: A 10-year-old orphan is sent to live with his aunt after the deaths of his parents, and befriends an old man. He starts to believe his new friend is really Santa Claus, but his new guardian worries that the seemingly kindly stranger is a conman taking advantage of the youngster's faith. Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin.(n)

programme.title: Ordinary Miracles
programme.desc: Kind-hearted judge Kay Woodbury refuses to believe a surly juvenile delinquent is beyond help, and takes the teenager in - but her efforts at rehabilitation are met with rebellious behaviour. Deciding the root of the problem lies in the girl's troubled past, Kay sets out to track down her father. Drama, starring Jaclyn Smith, Lyndsy Fonseca and C Thomas Howell.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy takes in a runaway child fleeing from her abusive stepfather. However, Grandpa is suspicious of her story.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia gets a job working for a dressmaker, but as her responsibilities grow, she starts to miss leading a simple life.(n)

programme.title: The Ann Jillian Story
programme.desc: Biopic of multi-talented entertainer Ann Jillian, following her marriage to a Chicago vice cop, her successful career and battle against breast cancer. Jillian plays herself alongside Tony LoBianco and Viveca Lindfors.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Shoes

Along the way, his tireless efforts inspire an amazing transformation in the life of a cold-hearted lawyer struggling to cope with the slow disintegration of his marriage. Festive family drama, starring Rob Lowe, Maria Del Mar, Max Morrow and Kimberly Williams.(n)

programme.title: Movie: Smiley
programme.desc: A young woman tests an urban legend about a murderous maniac named Smiley, who allegedly can be conjured from the Internet, and she begins to fear that her sanity is slipping away as the killer closes in(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Roost
programme.desc: Friends on their way to a wedding become trapped on a farm plagued by vampire bats(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Hollow
programme.desc: When the dreaded Headless Horseman returns to modern-era Sleepy Hollow in hopes of collecting some craniums, it's up to a teen who just happens to be a direct descendent of Ichabod Crane to put a stop to the headless happenings in this terrifying tale from director Kyle Newman. High school senior Ian Cranston (Kevin Zegers) is a newcomer to the town of Sleepy Hollow, and when Ian sets his sights on pretty cheerleader Karen (Kaley Cuoco) he soon incurs the wrath of her boyfriend, arrogant star quarterback Brody (Nick Carter). As Halloween approaches and Ian has a strange encounter with local gravedigger Clause (Stacy Keach), the tales of the Headless Horseman take an ominous slant as a pair of students go missing and Ian is told that he is a direct descended of the legendary Ichabod Crane. When the real Headless Horseman makes a shocking appearance at the annual Halloween hayride, Ian discovers that he is the only hope to save his father Carl (Judge Reinhold) from a grim fate at the hands of the vengeful entity(n)

programme.title: Movie: Around June
programme.desc: A young woman raised under suffocating circumstances finds the love that could help her transform her life for the better, if she can only summon the courage to break free from the grip of her abusive, domineering father. When June's mother died, so did the young girl's dreams of a brighter future away from the San Francisco shipyards. Ever since that tragedy, June (Samaire Armstrong) has led a sheltered existence under the close watch of her emotionally crippled father, Murry (Jon Gries), who never found the strength to get over his profound loss. Together with June's mentally challenged uncle Henry (Brad William Henke), they manage to remain together as a family despite the heavy cloud of grief hanging over their household. It's only after the sudden appearance of Juan Diego (Oscar H. Guerrero), an optimistic illegal immigrant, that June finally finds the courage to break away from her father and live the life she could only dream about before(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: A stunt pilot makes a name for himself as a jet-powered superhero after he discovers a top secret rocketpack. Adventure(n)

programme.title: Movie: Valhalla Rising

Upon reaching land, the perplexed travelers realize they are not alone(n)

programme.title: Movie: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony J. Rickert-Epstein's horror film Compound Fracture stars Tyler Mane as Michael Woffsen, a man whose father, Gary (Muse Watson) is having serious mental issues. Already paranoid, and constructing a security-heavy ultra-secure compound for his own safety, Gary has begun to slip into dementia, and has also begun dabbling in the occult. When Gary's current wife calls Michael to say she is leaving, he goes to his dad's place, with his own wife and nephew, in order to move Gary into an assisted living facility. However, it seems dad's supernatural obsessions have unleashed a lethal spirit that may kill Michael and his family(n)

programme.title: Movie: Rushmore

He falls in love with one of his teachers and in his quest to win her affections enlists the help of an eccentric millionaire - but his new friend is also in love with the same teacher(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's THE LIFE AQUATIC, a group of oceanic explorers who call themselves Team Zissou embark on a journey to hunt down the 'jaguar shark' that ate one of their crew members (Seymour Cassel). Determined to avenge the death of his dear friend, team leader Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) is melancholic about the journey he's about to make. Meanwhile, financial troubles and nostalgia for his past make Zissou behave like a reckless playboy, an ageing softy, and a past-his-prime tyrant. Surrounding Zissou are a hodgepodge of eccentrics--a pregnant journalist doing a magazine feature (Cate Blanchett), an airline pilot from Kentucky who claims he is Zissou's son (Owen Wilson), an emotionally needy European (Willem Dafoe), an acoustic guitarist who sings David Bowie songs in Brazilian Portuguese (Seu Jorge), Zissou's brilliant wife (Anjelica Houston), and her ex-husband who is Zissou's seafaring nemesis (Jeff Goldblum). Clad in baby-blue polyester uniforms, Adidas sneakers, and red stocking caps, Team Zissou is a sight to see. And as their deep-sea adventure takes them into dangerous waters where they are attacked by pirates and dazzled by CGI fish, the group finds magic both in their bonds to each other and in the colourful world around them. In keeping with Anderson's unique brand of escapist humour, these caricatured characters are nothing short of fascinating. While their lives are extraordinary, they act bored, dwelling on banalities like hurt feelings, jealousy, and loneliness. The more absurd their stories are, the more believable their quirky personalities become. With plenty of hilarious moments offsetting the film's tongue-in-cheek sentimentalism, THE LIFE AQUATIC is sure to please seasoned Anderson fans and make new ones of the uninitiated(n)

programme.title: Movie: Saved!

programme.title: Movie: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: Director Liza Johnson's low-key drama Hateship Loveship stars Kristen Wiig as Johanna, a mild-mannered woman hired by Mr. McCauley (Nick Nolte) to care for his granddaughter Sabitha (Hailee Steinfeld), whose teen growing pains are exacerbated by her irresponsible father Ken (Guy Pearce) and the fact that her mother passed away. Sabitha and her best friend begin catfishing Johanna, convincing her that Ken, who lives in a different city, has fallen in love with her. When Johanna makes the first impulsive decision of her life to travel to Ken, the truth comes out, but unexpected ramifications are in store for everyone. Hateship Loveship screened at the 2013 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Kentucky Fried Movie
programme.desc: Before Airplane, Naked Gun and Hot Shots, Jim Abrahams and David and Jerry Zucker wrote this sketch led film, directed by John Landis. Inevitably a little hit and miss, it still contains gems that stand up including fake film trailers (the best being Catholic High School Girls In Trouble), a wonderful spoof of the martial arts movie Enter The Dragon and the introduction of feel-around to cinemas. Not high art, just good, stupid, fast-fire fun. Guest appearances include Donald Sutherland, George Lazenby, Tony Dow and Bill Bixby(n)

programme.desc: An exploration of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, the French musicians who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Movie: Parenthood
programme.desc: Perceptive comedy drama following the ups and downs of parent-child relationships within a large family. An over-protective dad - determined to do a better job than his own distant father - anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers(n)

programme.title: Movie: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Anne Heche plays an ambitious magazine editor who becomes marooned on a deserted island with a gruff cargo pilot (Harrison Ford). Despite their conflicting personalities, the two castaways gradually fall for one another, even as they are besieged by mother nature and ruthless modern-day pirates. David Schwimmer, Jacqueline Obradors, Temuerra Morrison, Allison Janney(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Giver
programme.desc: In this thrilling adaptation of the beloved novel, a young man living in a totalitarian society learns the true history of his community from a mysterious yet seemingly benevolent figure known as the Giver. In time, the youth finds the burden of the truth too great to bear and plots to escape(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Who Live in Hyde Park
programme.desc: The Who perform in concert at London's Hyde Park on June 26, 2015. The 19-song playlist spans the band's 50-year history and includes "Who Are You," "Pinball Wizard" and "Won't Get Fooled Again."(n)

programme.title: Sleeper Cell
programme.desc: Al-Faitha. Hard-hitting drama surrounding the FBI's counter-terrorism operations. A federal agent risks everything to go undercover in order to infiltrate a group of Islamic terrorists(n)

programme.title: Sleeper Cell
programme.desc: Target. Darwyn and his cellmates stake out an urban mall as a possible terrorist target; Farik tries to entice a college microbiology student to step up his involvement in the cause; government surveillance operatives almost tip their hands; Darwyn's FBI boss wants to know what happened to Bobby, who's disappeared(n)

programme.title: Movie: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: An exploration of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, the French musicians who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Movie: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: Four college girls on spring break encounter a rapper- cum-gangster who inducts them into his whirlwind lifestyle of debauchery(n)

programme.title: Movie: Jay Pharoah: Can I Be Me?
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live actor and impressionist Jay Pharoah performs his first hour-long standup special from the Cutting Room in New York City. Pharoah talks about everyday issues like family relationships and race, in addition to doing some of his most skilled and famous impressions(n)

programme.title: Movie: Earthquake: These Ain't Jokes
programme.desc: Comic Earthquake performs a stand-up routine(n)

programme.title: Movie: Echoes of War
programme.desc: After the Civil War concludes, a veteran returns home to his Texas countryside ranch. Attempting to rid himself of the horrors of war, he instead finds himself involved in a conflict with a neighboring rancher(n)

programme.title: Movie: Knuckleball!
programme.desc: Major-league baseball pitchers usually throw fastballs, curveballs, and off-speed pitches. A few brave souls, however, have made a career out of throwing the knuckleball. The pitch entails lobbing the baseball in such a way that it doesn't rotate, and therefore moves in a manner that's impossible to predict. The filmmakers follow Tim Wakefield and R.A. Dickey, the only two knuckleball pitchers in the majors during the 2011 season, as they attempt to stay in the big leagues while relying on this unorthodox weapon(n)

programme.title: Movie: No God, No Master
programme.desc: Inspired by actual events that unfolded in the early 20th century, writer/producer/director Terry Green's historical drama No God, No Master details the investigation into a series of bombings targeting politicians and businessmen, and intended to herald the fall of democracy in the United States. The closer U.S. Bureau of Investigation Agent William Flynn (David Strathairn) gets to uncovering the truth about the sinister anarchist plot, the greater the threat to his own life, and the country he serves, becomes(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Our Father. Season 3 opens with Dexter tracking a killer who got away with murdering two university students, and winding up in a life-or-death struggle with a stranger who is in the wrong place at the wrong time. Debra investigates a high-profile homicide and gets pressured by an Internal Affairs officer, who wants her to snitch on a fellow cop; Angel gets good news about his career; Rita startles Dexter with some news of her own(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Finding Freebo. Something's gotta give when Debra and the homicide unit, Assistant District Attorney Miguel Prado and Dexter all chase the same serial killer, who murdered Prado's younger brother. On the home front, Dexter's faced with a big family decision involving Rita and her two children(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: The Lion Sleeps Tonight. Dexter has a run-in with a paedophile; Freebo is accused of a murder he didn't commit, and Dexter knows the truth but can't say anything about it. Also, Dexter's friendship with Miguel begins to weigh on his mind(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: All in the Family. Razor-sharp drama series centring on a serial killer who also works for the police. Dexter tries to convince Rita to allow him to be a part of her and her baby's life(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Turning Biminese. Rita wants Dexter to move in with her and the kids before they wed, but he's confused about it; Miguel tips off Dexter about a husband who's gotten away with murdering two wives for the financial windfall, and Dexter ends up tracking him to the Bahamas; Debra becomes attracted to a confidential informant who is helping her track down one of Freebo's partners in crime(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Si Se Puede. Razor-sharp drama series centring on a serial killer who also works for the police. An anxious Debra thinks someone is following her after another of her witnesses is found dead(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Easy as Pie. Razor-sharp drama series centring on a serial killer who also works for the police. Dexter gets to work with Miguel, while Debra has a theory about The Skinner's next victim(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.sub-title: The Damage a Man Can Do
programme.desc: The Damage a Man Can Do. Razor-sharp drama series centring on a serial killer who also works for the police. Dexter fears his friendship with Miguel might have gone one step too far. But will he end it?(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: About Last Night. Rita's intention to confront Miguel about his alleged infidelity has an impact on his friendship with Dexter; Debra pulls out all the stops to locate Anton after it is believed that he's been abducted by the Skinner(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Go Your Own Way. Razor-sharp drama series centring on a serial killer who also works for the police. Dexter and Miguel's bitter game of cat and mouse intensifies when Miguel threatens Debra's career(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: I Had a Dream. Dexter preps for his wedding day but must first divorce himself from Miguel, which proves most difficult as Miguel is a prominent District Attorney and Dexter's best man. Sylvia confides in Rita that Miguel has been seeing an ex-lover; Debra digs up new clues in the Skinner case(n)

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Do You Take Dexter Morgan?. Miguel's out of the picture, but his unstable brother Ramon still poses a threat to Dexter; a potentially fatal surprise could imperil Dexter's impending nuptials to Rita; Debra learns she's in line to get her detective's shield, but troublesome news could tarnish her promotion(n)

programme.title: Strikeforce: Le vs. Morgan
programme.desc: Cung Le vs. Sam Morgan from 2007 in San Jose(n)

programme.title: Inside the NFL
programme.desc: 2015 Week 15. A review of Week 15(n)

programme.title: Movie: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: A taxi-driving loner is rejected by the woman he's been stalking so devotes himself to rescuing an underage hooker. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Movie: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of international special agents is hired to carry out a mysterious mission: to steal a heavily guarded briefcase, wanted by both the IRA and the Russian mafia. Action thriller(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Toy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Richard Pryor as a hapless writer who finds himself employed by a millionaire who wants to give his son a playmate(n)

programme.title: Movie: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: Adventure flies higher than ever before in this sequel that finds championship air-racer Dusty Crophopper (voice of Dane Cook) beginning an exciting new career fighting forest fires. In the wake of another successful racing season, Dusty returns home to Propwash Junction to resume his training. But a debilitating injury forces Rusty to consider a new career path. Before long Rusty is training with the Aerial Fire Fighters at Piston Peak Air Attack Base. Becoming a Single Engine Air Tanker (SEAT) is no simple task for an injured plane, but with the guidance of seasoned fire-and-rescue helicopter Blade Ranger (voice of Ed Harris), fearless leader of the Piston Peak Air Attack team, Rusty is soon soaring through the clouds once again. Meanwhile, as Rusty gets up to speed, his presence in the unit catches the attention of Dipper (voice of Julie Bowen), a cargo hauler-turned-water scooper capable of skimming lake water to combat raging fires. A major racing fan, Dipper can hardly contain her excitement at the prospect of working alongside Rusty, and meanwhile wise, heavy-lift helicopter Windlifter (voice of Wes Studi) has never encountered a fire he couldn't conquer. In no time Rusty has made a whole host of new friends at Piston Peak, including hulking transport plane Cabbie (voice of Dale Dye), the brave grounded firefighters known as the Smokejumpers, the Secretary of the Interior (voice of Fred Willard), and Nick "Loop'n" Lopez (voice of Erik Estrada), a helicopter cop with an illustrious past. And though learning the secrets to dousing forest fires is sure to take time, Rusty is a fast learner, and eager to pitch in(n)

programme.title: Movie: Jury Duty
programme.desc: A quirky character gets himself onto the jury of a sensational murder trial and causes havoc(n)

programme.title: Movie: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Orin Hanner is a rich man intent on becoming richer by allowing toxic waste to be dumped into abandoned mineshafts. His scheme hits a snag when a mysterious stranger breezes into town with a guitar, a gun and a leather jacket. Action(n)

programme.title: Movie: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: James Braddock was the washed-up 1930s boxer who could hardly pay his bills when he returned to the ring. Nobody gave Braddock a chance, but he kept winning, all the way to a title shot against the invincible Max Baer(n)

programme.title: Movie: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A pre-teen film fan is in for a wild ride when a fictional movie hero comes to life and drags him into the onscreen action(n)

programme.title: Movie: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Revenge comedy about three put-upon secretaries who decide to get even with their slave-driving boss(n)

programme.title: Movie: Mannequin
programme.desc: Kim Cattrall and Andrew McCarthy star in this romantic comedy about a department store mannequin which comes to life when left alone with a young window-dresser. The young man discovers the dummy is the incarnation of an ancient Egyptian princess, and the two begin an after-hours love affair. But her inability - or unwillingness - to reveal herself to anyone else causes him problems and puts him in numerous embarrassing situations(n)

programme.title: Movie: Cinderella Man

programme.desc: James Bond must unmask the mysterious head of the Janus Syndicate and prevent his one time ally - Alec Trevelyan Agent 006 - from utilising the GoldenEye weapons system to inflict devastating revenge on Britain(n)

programme.title: Movie: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: From the rugged prairie lands of 19th Century America to the trenches of World War I, this story follows the journey of three brothers into the secrets of love, betrayal and unbreakable bonds of love(n)

programme.title: Movie: Mean Guns
programme.desc: A crime boss ponies up $10 million to the winner of a gunfight to be held in a run-down correctional facility(n)

programme.desc: An up-and-coming rapper (Pras) and his best friend-manager (Ja Rule) finance a demo recording with funds from drug deals and other criminal activities. Mr. B: Jason Statham. Graham. Master Mix: Harry-O. Chang: Chang Tseng. Minister: Jeff Jones(n)

programme.title: Movie: Where the Trail Ends
programme.desc: Extreme mountain bikers are followed as they seek out some of the toughest trails in the world(n)

programme.title: Movie: Aliens
programme.desc: This sequel to the sci-fi classic Alien ups the danger and the firepower, pitting Ripley, only survivor of the first film's horrific alien attack, against a whole hive of deadly extraterrestrials. Director Cameron emphasizes action and award-winning special effects as Ripley leads her shipmates in combat against the fearsome creatures(n)

programme.title: Movie: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Richard Pryor and Gene Wilder appear as two handicapped guys--one of them is blind and the other's deaf--who become suspects in a murder which occurred in their midst. They continue to be involved as the real murderer(ess?) bails them from jail, but then pursues them, thinking they have possession of a valuable item(n)

programme.title: Movie: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Fast-moving police thriller about a river-rescue cop hunting for his father's murderer. Convinced that he was just one victim of a serial killer, Tom Hardy risks his life to bring the killer to justice. Increasingly at odds with his police partner over his actions in this very personal case, he soon finds himself a pawn in a much larger game(n)

programme.title: Movie: Trapped
programme.desc: When their daughter is abducted and taken for ransom by a gang of serial kidnappers, a young doctor and his wife find themselves held hostage while a 24-hour plan to extort their money is set into motion. Now, with time running out they find themselves in a life-and-death race against the clock as the "perfect crime" begins spiraling towards an unthinkable, terrifying and deadly conclusion(n)

programme.title: Movie: Blind Fury
programme.desc: Rutger Hauer plays a blinded Vietnam vet who also happens to be an expert swordsman. Twenty years after the war, Hauer finds himself waist-deep in gangsters when he tries to help the son of an old army buddy. Along the way, he reforms an ex-comrade in arms who was responsible for the accident that blinded him. Based on a series of Japanese films about a blind samurai (released under the blanket title of Zatoichi)(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Mind of Mark Defriest
programme.desc: A profile of a talented jailbreak artist who is forced to spend time in the harshest penitentiary in Florida after a psychiatrist testified that he was faking mental illness for decades. The filmmakers explore how the legal and penal systems have treated this man(n)

programme.title: Movie: Paper Planes
programme.desc: In this family film a young boy living in a small country town dreams of making it to the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan despite having no funds to get there and a disapproving father. Directed by Robert Connolly. Cast includes Sam Worthington and Ed Oxenbould(n)

programme.title: Movie: Swimming Upstream
programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s swimming champion Tony Fingleton(n)

programme.title: Movie: Another Stakeout
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss and Emilio Estevez reprise their roles from the 1987 hit, protecting witness Cathy Moriarty from hitman Miguel Ferrer . Comedy dogs and meddling FBI mixed with gags and explosions(n)

programme.title: Movie: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: In this touching dramedy, a twentysomething man named Craig embarks on a road trip that could threaten his cross-country move with his girlfriend. Along the way, he visits some of the world's largest roadside attractions(n)

programme.title: Movie: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy starring Kevin Costner about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. An amphibious loner, 'The Mariner', tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also intent on discovering if there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: Movie: 12 Monkeys
programme.desc: An unknown and lethal virus has wiped out 5 billion people in 1996. Only 1% of the population has survived by the year 2035, and is forced to live underground. A convict reluctantly volunteers to be sent back in time to 1996 to gather information about the origin of the epidemic (who he's told was spread by a mysterious "Army of the 12 Monkeys") and locate the virus before it mutates so that scientists can study it. Unfortunately Cole is mistakenly sent to 1990, six years earlier than expected, and is arrested and locked up in a mental institution, where he meets Dr. Kathryn Railly, a psychiatrist, and Jeffrey Goines, the insane son of a famous scientist and virus expert(n)

programme.title: Movie: Exists
programme.desc: A group of young twenty somethings journey into an isolated Texan wood for a weekend of heavy partying. However, they quickly discover they are not alone, and are being stalked by the impossible creature who has become legend(n)

programme.title: Movie: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister(n)

programme.title: Movie: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy starring Kevin Costner about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. programme.title: Movie: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: A wealthy tycoon whose life is orderly and happy finds his household disrupted by the arrival of a young man called Joe Black. His daughter falls for the young man innocent of the fact that Joe is Death, visiting Earth to take the life of her father..(n)

programme.title: Movie: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: After serving five years in jail, Billy kidnaps teen Layla and has her pose as his loving wife for his parents. Eventually, Billy tries to track down and murder the man he holds responsible for his five years in the slammer(n)

programme.title: Movie: Gucci: The Director
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of Gucci's creative director, Frida Giannini, explores her life and her influence on the iconic Italian fashion house(n)

programme.title: Movie: Leave the World Behind
programme.desc: Electronic-music group Swedish House Mafia embark on their final world tour(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Watcher
programme.desc: James Spader stars as burnt-out FBI agent Joel Campbell, whose attempts to catch a serial killer terrifying Los Angeles end in failure. Moving to Chicago, he seeks psychiatric help from Dr Polly Beilman but then finds his past has come back to haunt him. The killer, David Allen Griffin, has tired of life in the sun and followed him to the Windy City. He taunts Campbell by sending him photographs of the next victim, giving the agent just 24 hours to find them before he kills them. As the murders begin again, Campbell realises he must catch Griffin to lay his own demons to rest, but Griffin's next intended victim is one Campbell knows too well. Joe Charbanic's debut feature is a taut thriller with Spader and Reeves on top form as protagonists who are two sides of the same coin(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Hunter
programme.desc: A mercenary seeks to capture an elusive Tasmanian tiger for a biotech-research company, and he clashes with local loggers while getting involved with a troubled mother and her two young children(n)

programme.title: Movie: Max
programme.desc: It's 1918 in Munich and Max Rothman, a successful Jewish art gallery owner, meets fellow war veteran and aspiring young artist Adolf Hitler. Max takes Hitler under his wing and encourages him to paint. But Hitler, unsuccessful as an artist, transfers his energies to politics where he soon finds an outlet for his crude beliefs…(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Urban fairytale set in Manchester. A series of tragic events that blight a young boy's life are reversed one Christmas Eve, giving him and those around him the happy ending that they were destined to have(n)

programme.title: Movie: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this unforgettable retro comedy, a hip-hop-loving teen strives to master the game of table tennis during a family vacation to Ocean City, Md., in 1985. Now, in a bid to win the heart of a pretty girl, he'll have to go paddle-to-paddle against a bully who's determined to paint him as a loser(n)

programme.title: Movie: An Inconvenient Truth
programme.desc: Former vice president Al Gore shares his concerns on the pressing issue of global warming in this documentary. A long-time environmental activist, Gore first became aware of evidence on global warming in the 1970s, and since leaving public office he has become a passionate advocate for large- and small-scale changes in our laws and lifestyles that could help alleviate this crisis. An Inconvenient Truth records a multi-media presentation hosted by Gore in which he discusses the scientific facts behind global warming, explains how it has already begun to affect our environment, talks about the disastrous consequences if the world's governments and citizens do not act, and shares what each individual can do to help protect the Earth for this and future generations. An Inconvenient Truth was directed by Davis Guggenheim, a veteran documentary filmmaker who also has an extensive background in episodic television(n)

programme.title: Movie: Scary Movie
programme.desc: Comic parody of the teen horror genre. A group of rather dim-witted teenagers accidentally kill a man in a car accident and hide the body. One year later, they are being terrorised by a sinister serial killer. As the body count rises, they also have to contend with the attentions of a persistent and annoying reporter and an eccentric high-school principal(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Urban fairytale set in Manchester. A series of tragic events that blight a young boy's life are reversed one Christmas Eve, giving him and those around him the happy ending that they were destined to have(n)

An Inconvenient Truth was directed by Davis Guggenheim, a veteran documentary filmmaker who also has an extensive background in episodic television(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Christmas Heart
programme.desc: The people of a close-knit neighbourhood rally round when a local boy needs a heart transplant. A suitable donor organ is found just before Christmas and is transported to the hospital by plane, but an unexpected storm jeopardises its chances of being delivered on time(n)

programme.title: Movie: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: When Child Services threatens to take J.T. and Alana Thompson from their drug-addicted mother, their Aunt Emily is forced into action. Emily runs away with the children, hiding in the sleepy New England hamlet of Bethlehem. With the help of a kind angel, and a Christmas miracle, the Thompsons hope to keep their family together and finally find lasting happiness(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: A dysfunctional family gets stranded in a remote and impoverished town two days before Christmas, and ends up getting involved in the local festive pageant. As they help the townsfolk with their problems, they also learn to get along better with each other(n)

programme.title: Movie: Santa, Jr.
programme.desc: Father Christmas's ne'er-do-well son finds himself in hot water when he lands in jail - just as he's supposed to be mastering the art of delivering presents to wide-eyed youngsters around the world. So when Chris and his young partner Daryl are jailed on the eve of Christmas Eve for badly imitating Santa and lurking about in the dark trying to deliver toys, Chris needs help - fast. The anti-Christmas spirited Susan is assigned to help Chris get bail, but she refuses to believe he is the son of Santa or that Santa even exists. So with Christmas Eve fast approaching, trapped with no elf, no magic sack of goodies, Chris is in a race against time to keep Christmas on schedule(n)

programme.title: Movie: Christmas Magic
programme.desc: A new angel must earn her wings by helping a depressed widower save his struggling restaurant(n)

programme.title: Movie: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newly blended family clash over conflicting Christmas traditions, and none of the kids are interested in compromising. Dixie Carter, John Ratzenberger, Julie Warner and Steven Eckholdt star. Directed by Armand Mastroianni(n)

programme.title: Movie: When Angels Come to Town
programme.desc: Heart-warming story about an angel who comes to earth on a heavenly mission, but ends up saving the wrong family(n)

programme.title: The Hollywood Christmas Parade
programme.desc: Penn and Teller serve as grand marshals of the 84th annual Hollywood holiday procession featuring celebrity appearances, decorated floats and marching bands. Erik Estrada, Laura McKenzie, Dean Cain and Montel Williams provide parade commentary. Taped Nov. 29, 2015(n)

programme.title: Movie: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: An airport snafu strands a holiday traveler, so she and a kind stranger share the last rental car and head to Seattle. After some discord, they begin to bond, but that changes when the woman learns her travel buddy is an FBI agent assigned to trail her(n)

programme.title: Movie: Cancel Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus discovers that Christmas is in danger of being cancelled because children are too greedy. He decides to prove otherwise, adopting a disguise and visiting two kids and teaching them about the importance of charity(n)

programme.title: Movie: Magic Stocking
programme.desc: A widowed mother struggles to move on with her life a few years after her husband's death, but then the magic of Christmas begins to touch her after she purchases a very special stocking at a craft fair(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Christmas Blessing
programme.desc: MIRACLE OF THE HEART is a sequel to the earlier CBS holiday offering THE CHRISTMAS SHOES, with Rob Lowe briefly reprising his portrayal of Robert Layton, a lawyer whose life was forever changed by a pair of 'enchanted' shoes(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Drastic Voyage: Part II. The conclusion of the Season 6 finale sees the end of the gang's most incredible voyage(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Mole Hunt. When Malory questions Archer's expense account, he must break into the ISIS mainfame to tidy it up. Meanwhile, the hunt is on for a mole; and Lana and Cyril's Friday-night dinner is interrupted by an urgent call(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: Met Someone. In a flashback to their first meeting, Paul recalls how he accidentally bumped into Jamie and she remembers inviting Paul to her office Christmas party(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: New Year's Eve. Not by choice, Paul and Jamie Buchman (Paul Reiser, Helen Hunt) spend their first New Year's Eve apart. This is not the only offbeat occurrence in the course of this episode, you may be sure. Things reach a summit of strangeness during the traditional countdown in Times Square. And yes, that uncredited TV personality is exactly who you think he is(n)

programme.title: In Living Color
programme.desc: The Irish Singer. Wanda hires a PI to find her child's father; a fan harasses a basketball player; an Irish folk singer performs depressing songs at a rehab center(n)

programme.title: In Living Color
programme.desc: Droop! There It Is. Marsha Warfield encounters studio pages Ace and Main Man; Cheap Pete works a bar; "Rush Limbaugh" and "Al Sharpton" run a men's store. Also: Background Guy (James Carrey) gets a girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: The Comeback Kid. Leslie stages an attention-getting event. Meanwhile, Andy and April adopt a pet, and Ben takes up a new hobby(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Campaign Ad. Leslie and Ben clash while working on her first campaign ad. Elsewhere, Chris tries to befriend Ron, making Ron very uncomfortable, while April and Andy take a trip to the doctor(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Bowling for Votes. Feedback from a focus group prompts Leslie to host a bowling party in hopes of gathering support for her campaign. Meanwhile, April, Chris, Donna and Jerry begin cold-calling voters while competing to see who can raise the most money for Leslie's campaign(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Operation Ann. Leslie makes it her mission to find Ann a date for Valentine's Day. Meanwhile, Ben turns to Ron for help in figuring out Leslie's elaborate Valentine scavenger hunt, and Chris is troubled by the status of his love life(n)

programme.title: Movie: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: Looking for a new start, a widowed father-of-two moves his kids out of the city to take on the project of renovating a derelict zoo(n)

programme.title: Movie: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: This adventure comedy finds perpetual underdog Larry Daley getting quite a shock when his mantle as a late-night museum security guard is put to the test after the exhibits come to life once again and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the Smithsonian museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Lorax
programme.desc: In a land where real vegetation is rare, a young boy seeks to impress his pretty neighbour by getting a tree. But in the process, he encounters the Lorax, a cantankerous yet endearing creature intent on preserving the forest(n)

programme.title: Movie: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Hotel Transylvania is the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world, until an unwitting hitchhiker tries to check in. Animated fun with the voice of Adam Sandler. (2012)(87 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr. Plow. Adam West and Linda Ronstadt have cameos as Homer and Barney become competitors in the snow-ploughing business(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Tis the Fifteenth Season. Guilt-stricken at having spent all the family's Christmas money on himself, Homer resolves to turn over a new leaf and become a do-gooder - but his kindness soon starts to rival that of Ned Flanders, and the neighbours embark on a battle for supremacy(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsons Christmas Stories. Head to Springfield on Christmas Day for three festive tales in one: In church, Homer's giving his version of the nativity, Grampa wants revenge on Santa Claus after a confrontation during the war and Moe's yuletide suicide attempt is played out to the tune of the Nutcracker(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II. Homer jumps into a brawl during a holiday ice-skating show. To escape the melee, Marge takes the family Christmas shopping, where a chance encounter with Gil leads to bad luck for Gil and the Simpson clan. Elvis Stojko voices himself(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind
programme.desc: Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind. Homer loses his memory---and his family---when he drinks Moe's most potent libation, the Forget-Me-Shot, in an episode that spoofs "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind" and "It's a Wonderful Life."(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Fight Before Christmas. Four wittily woven tales that, like egg nog with lashings of brandy, are sweet and sharp in equal measure. Pop princess Katy Perry guest stars(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Holidays of Future Passed. Flash-forward to 2041: Bart and Lisa are heading home for the holidays with their own kids in tow. And when they turn to Marge and Homer for parenting advice, they come to realize that the apple doesn't fall far from the Christmas tree(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: White Christmas Blues. Marge turns the house into a B&B to make some extra money for Christmas, while Lisa sets to work buying cheap but thoughtful presents(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Training Day. Ineptitude trumps intrigue in a spy spoof focusing on ISIS agent Sterling Archer (voice of H. Jon Benjamin), who has James Bond's vices down pat, if not his virtues. In the opener, Archer must train comptroller Cyril Figgis, who has been promoted to agent by the agency's head---Archer's mother, Malory. Voices...Cyril: Chris Parnell. Malory: Jessica Walter. Agent Lana Kane: Aisha Tyler(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Killing Utne. Malory hosts a dinner party for the UN Intelligence chairman (voice of Jeffrey Tambor) to get a contract for ISIS, but assassins are out to kill him. Voice of Mannfred: Rene Auberjonois(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A roundtable discussion on the series' 20-year history, including international stories, investigative pieces, issue-oriented segments and profiles of individuals. Segments reviewed include Qatar and the World Cup; marketing shooting sports to children; and endurance athletes Dick and Rick Hoyt(n)

programme.title: Movie: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organisation. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: Movie: Fall to Grace
programme.desc: In 2004, New Jersey governor Jim McGreevey was struggling with his public image and the political fallout from allegations of sexual harassment when he resigned from office after making a surprising revelation -- that he was "a Gay American" who was in a relationship with a man despite being married to a woman. McGreevey's marriage and political career were soon over, and outside of the public eye, he began following a different path. In the documentary Fall To Grace, filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi offers a look into the life of Jim McGreevey eight years after he left office: a man of renewed religious faith, he serves as a counselor, mentor, and spiritual advisor to the female prisoners at the Hudson County Correctional Center, and is in a stable, long-term relationship with another man as he strives to serve those who need help rather than chasing power and privilege. Fall Into Grace was produced for the HBO premium cable network, and received its world premiere at the 2013 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Movie: Get On Up
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman stars as James Brown in this biopic from Universal Studios and director Tate Taylor (The Help). From a childhood spent in poverty to his emergence as the Godfather of Soul, Brown's incredible life story is one of talent, determination, and perseverance. Brian Grazer, Mick Jagger, Victoria Pearman, and Erica Huggins produce a film co-penned in part by Jez and John-Henry Butterworth (Fair Game)(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: The Tough Brets. After disparaging rappers in a song, Bret starts a gang when he fears for his safety; Murray endures a series of degrading encounters with members of the Australian consulate(n)

programme.title: Movie: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A street dancer and his ragtag troupe enter a reality-TV competition in order to win a lucrative three-year contract at a Las Vegas casino(n)

programme.title: Movie: 28 Days
programme.desc: Luego de sufrir un accidente automovolístico cuando conducía ebria el día del casamiento de su hermana, Gwen Cummings debe decidir entre ir a prisión o a un centro de rehabilitación. Elige la rehabilitación, pero se resiste a tomar parte en los programas(n)

programme.title: U2: iNNOCENCE + eXPERIENCE Live in Paris
programme.desc: A live performance from U2, who play songs off of their album "Songs of Innocence" in addition to some of their past hits, in a show recorded at Bercy Arena in Paris(n)

programme.desc: The Divergent trilogy continues in this sequel from Lionsgate and Summit Entertainment(n)

programme.desc: A look at Moscow's Bolshoi Ballet, and the events surrounding an acid attack against its director that took place in 2013(n)

programme.title: Movie: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: Wolverine travels back in time to bring the X-Men past and present together to save both mutant and humankind. Working alongside versions of themselves, the team must alter the course of the future by reshaping a crucial historical event(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: The Divergent trilogy continues in this sequel from Lionsgate and Summit Entertainment(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: A year-in-review edition including a roundtable chat with Max Kellerman and Bernard Hopkins on top storylines of 2015 and a look ahead to 2016(n)

programme.title: 2015 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony
programme.desc: The 30th annual gala honors Ringo Starr; Bill Withers; Paul Butterfield Blues Band; the "5" Royales; Joan Jett and the Blackhearts; Lou Reed; Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble; and Green Day. Performers include Jimmie Vaughan, Joe Walsh, Dave Grohl, Zac Brown, Tom Morello, Gary Clark Jr., John Legend, Beck, John Mayer and Karen O. Taped at Cleveland's Public Hall on April 18, 2015(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Unbroken'
programme.desc: A look at "Unbroken," a 2014 drama based on the life of former Olympian and Japanese POW Louis Zamperini (1917-2014). The film stars Jack O'Connell, Domhnall Gleeson and Miyavi, and is directed by Angelina Jolie(n)

programme.title: Movie: Transcendence
programme.desc: In this ingenious sci-fi thriller, an AI expert's consciousness is transferred into a computer after he is killed. As his awareness goes viral, he becomes an unstoppable force inhabiting every computer and electrical system on the planet(n)

programme.title: Movie: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true. Based upon a short story by acclaimed science fiction writer Brain Aldiss(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Exodus: Gods And Kings'
programme.desc: A look at "Exodus: Gods and Kings," a 2014 retelling of the biblical story about Moses leading the Israelites out of Egypt. The film stars Christian Bale, Sigourney Weaver and Ben Kingsley, and is directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: Movie: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: When a pudgy, bespectacled seven-year-old, Olive (Abigail Breslin), voices her desire to take home the coveted Little Miss Sunshine crown at an upcoming beauty pageant, her wildly dysfunctional family sets out on an interstate road trip to ensure her a clear shot at realizing her dreams in former music video directorial team Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris' quirky feature debut, starring Greg Kinnear, Steve Carell, and Toni Collette. Despite early career success as an outspoken motivational speaker, family patriarch Richard (Kinnear) continues to cling to his "Refuse to Lose" philosophy, much to the chagrin of his increasingly annoyed spouse, Sheryl (Collette). Add into the mix a Nietzsche-reading teenage son (Paul Dano) who has taken a vow of silence until he finds his fate as a fighter pilot; a horny, heroin-happy grandfather (Alan Arkin) with a penchant for creative profanity; and a suicidal genius (Carell) and Proust scholar still reeling about losing both his male lover and his MacArthur Foundation genius grant -- and the stage is set for a road trip in which sanity is sure to take the back seat(n)

programme.title: Movie: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Cuando Nick Parsons aparenta haber sido asesinado por su esposa Libby, ésta es juzgada y encerrada en prisión, pero ella sospecha que su marido sigue vivo. Cuando seis años más tarde, es puesta en libertad, es ayudada por su agente de la condicional Travi(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Federal agent Elliot Ness assembles a personal team of mob fighters to bring Chicago crime boss Al Capone to justice using unconventional means during the mob wars of the 1920s(n)

programme.title: Movie: Fighting
programme.desc: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit(n)

programme.title: Movie: V for Vendetta
programme.desc: From the creators of "The Matrix" comes this stylish action thriller about a mysterious masked avenger known as V, who leads a revolution against tyranny in a futuristic, totalitarian Britain(n)

programme.title: Movie: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and director Shawn Levy return for more after-hours mayhem in this third outing of the successful Night at the Museum series. When the magic that brings the exhibits to life begins to fade, Larry (Ben Stiller) rallies his historical friends for a trip to London and the adventure of a lifetime. Owen Wilson, Steve Coogan, Ricky Gervais, and Rebel Wilson co-star(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Player
programme.desc: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Next Best Thing
programme.desc: Comedy drama about two best friends, a straight woman and a gay man, who decide to have a child together. Five years later she falls in love with another man and wants to move away, and a messy custody battle ensues(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Danish Girl'
programme.desc: A look at "The Danish Girl," a 2015 adaptation of David Ebershoff's novel about early 20th-century Danish painter Einar Wegener, who was one of the first people to have sex-reassignment surgery. The film stars Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander and Matthias Schoenaerts, and is directed by Tom Hooper(n)

programme.title: Movie: Best in Show
programme.desc: A cross section of American eccentrics gather with their prized pets at a Philadelphia dog show(n)

programme.title: Movie: For Your Consideration
programme.desc: Jay Berman is in the process of directing his first feature film -- an intimate family drama set in the 1940s and detailing the tempestuous reunion of an estranged Jewish family that is reluctantly drawn together to celebrate Purim at the behest of their dying matriarch(n)

programme.title: Movie: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Comedy Starring Bill Murray, Sharon Stone and Jessica Lange. Directed by Jim Jarmusch. As the devoutly single Don Johnston is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he receives an anonymous pink letter informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. The situation causes Don to examine his relationships with women instead of moving on to the next one, and he embarks on a cross-country search for his old flames who might possess clues to the mystery at hand(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: Peter Sellers stars in the first movie following the misadventures of bumbling French sleuth Inspector Clouseau(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
programme.desc: Fourth film in the Pink Panther series is considered to rank alongside the original in quality. Directed by Blake Edwards, Peter Sellers is again the bumbling Inspector Clouseau, this time the target of his ex-boss, Chief Inspector Dreyfus. Driven mad by Clouseau's antics, he escapes from the asylum, captures a scientist who creates a city-destroying device and blackmails the world with one demand - kill Clouseau! As the finest assassins close in, Clouseau blithely tries to track down Dreyfus, oblivious to one failed assassination attempt after another in a series of classic comic set pieces(n)

programme.title: Movie: Curse of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: Curse of the Pink Panther was released just after Trail of the Pink Panther with a script that has someone looking for the inept Inspector Clousseau and the fabulous stolen Pink Panther diamond at the same time. In Curse, Clifton Sleigh (Ted Wass) is a New York retread of the bumbling Inspector, chosen to look for him by Clousseau's former boss because Sleigh most certainly will never find him. Although peppered with a few inventive stunts, Curse still falls short of the Sellers classics. In a bizarre side note, David Niven was himself terminally ill at the time of his appearance in Trail of the Pink Panther and unable to speak adequately. His voice was dubbed in by impressionist Rich Little(n)

programme.title: Movie: Son of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: Eighth entry in the Pink Panther. It is nearly 30 years since Inspector Jacques Clouseau managed to get Maria Gambrelli off from a murder charge (events of 'A Shot In The Dark'.) Maria has gone on and have moved to a seaside town. Also Princess Yasmin of Lugash has come to the town for a holiday with her father. She is kidnapped and because of the strong ties between France and Lugash, Chief Inspector Dreyfus is called in to find her. He is hampered by the local police officer Jacques and is amazed when he finds that Jacques is Maria's son. He is terrified even though he and Maria are falling in love that Jacques is Clouseau's son and Jacques is showing Clouseau-ish behaviour. Both Jacques and Dreyfus set out to find the missing Princess..(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
programme.desc: Insurance investigator CW Briggs and his office nemesis Betty Ann are hypnotised by a crooked magician and forced to steal priceless jewels. The real catch comes when CW has to investigate his own crime(n)

programme.title: Movie: Pootie Tang
programme.desc: Chris Rock whips Blaxploitation into the 21st-century with this bizarre comedy about an irresistible crimefighter, who moonlights as a star of music and movies. He draws his superpowers from his trademark belt, until seductress Ireenie steals it for the evil Lecter Corporation(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: (2003) Starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi. Directed by Sofia Coppola. Everyone wants to be found. Sometimes you have to go halfway around the world to come full circle. A movie star with a sense of emptiness, and a neglected newlywed meet up as strangers in Tokyo, Japan and form an unlikely bond(n)

programme.title: Movie: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Comedy Starring Bill Murray, Sharon Stone and Jessica Lange. Directed by Jim Jarmusch. As the devoutly single Don Johnston is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he receives an anonymous pink letter informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. The situation causes Don to examine his relationships with women instead of moving on to the next one, and he embarks on a cross-country search for his old flames who might possess clues to the mystery at hand(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Man
programme.desc: Federal agent Derrick is forced to team up with mild-mannered dentist Andy to take down a ruthless arms dealer. Andy doesn't want any part of this cop caper, so Derrick has to push him a little(n)

programme.title: Movie: Citizen U.S.A.: A 50 State Road Trip
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi's patriotic travelogue crisscrosses the U.S. to attend naturalization ceremonies in all 50 states and listens to recent immigrants from around the world explain their decision to become American citizens. The film is inspired by the naturalization process experienced by Pelosi's Dutch-born husband, Michiel Vos(n)

programme.title: Movie: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: An inept student offers to kill the ex-wife of his professor in exchange for the teacher murdering the student's mother(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Slippery Sticky Mirror. Topics include "Slippery," "Sticky" and "Mirror."(n)

programme.desc: Above Below Cover. Topics include "Above," "Below" and "Cover."(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Swing Cover Shake. Topics include "Swing," "Cover" and "Shake."(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: The Happy Prince. A statue (voice of Ed Koch) and a New York City pigeon (Cyndi Lauper) form a partnership to help the needy in this animated version of Oscar Wilde's parable about sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Henny Penny. A retooling of "Henny Penny" follows a sky-is-falling election debate in a barnyard after a reporter (voice of Sharon Stone) is hit in the head by an acorn. Voices...Turkey Lurkey: Alan M. Dershowitz. Lucy Goosey: Mary Hart. Foxy Woxy: Johnnie L. Cochran Jr. Merle: Geraldine A. Ferraro. Earl: Rudy Giuliani. Wooster Rooster: John McLaughlin. Ducky Daddles: Henry A. Kissinger. Cocky Locky: Rev. Jesse L. Jackson(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: The Frog Princess. In "The Frog Princess," a human prince learns from his amphibian bride that he can do tasks usually assigned to women, such as cooking and sewing. Voices include Greg Kinnear, Jasmine Guy, Beau Bridges and Scott Thompson(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Open Wide. Getting teeth pulled is the subject(n)
