programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Movie: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: If you could talk to the child that you used to be, what advice would you give him? That question forms the basis of this comic fantasy. Forty-year-old Russ Duritz (Bruce Willis) is a wealthy and powerful "image consultant" who has made a career out of telling people how to present themselves. But while he's a success in business, he's a failure in life; he's vain, mean-spirited, and hasn't been able to hold onto a marriage (or even a pet dog). One day, Russ is startled to meet Rusty (Spencer Breslin), a stocky kid whom he soon realizes is himself at the age of eight, having passed through a wrinkle in time. Young Rusty doesn't seem much happier than the grown-up Russ, so the older man takes his younger self under his wing and tries to teach him how to avoid the mistakes he's made, while Rusty encourages Russ to be a more caring human being. Along the way, Russ and Rusty become friends, and realize how much they can learn from each other. Disney's The Kid also stars Jean Smart as one of Russ' clients, Lily Tomlin as his assistant, and Daniel Von Bargen as his father(n)

programme.title: Movie: Happily N'Ever After
programme.desc: Cinderella's wicked stepmother has tipped the balance of power toward the dark side in Fairy Tale Land, and now it's up to the put-upon princess to restore order and ensure that good triumphs in an animated adventure featuring the voices of Sarah Michelle Gellar, Freddie Prinze Jr., Sigourney Weaver, and George Carlin. For years, the Wise Wizard has worked hard to ensure that the scales of good and evil were always well-balanced, but as with any hard worker the Wise Wizard needs a relaxing vacation every once in a while. When the Wise Wizard goes on holiday, his faithful assistants Munk and Mambo make the crucial mistake of allowing Cinderella's wicked stepmother, Frieda, come into possession of their master's magical staff. With time fast running out before Frieda casts a shadow of darkness and sorrow over Fairy Tale Land, Cinderella must now awaken from her romantic dreams to take on her fearsome stepmother with a little help from her best friend, Rick, and a virtual army of heroic dwarves and fairies(n)

programme.title: Movie: Shrek
programme.desc: Devious Lord Farquaad sends mighty ogre Shrek to rescue his bride for him. Horny dragons, wise-cracking donkeys and a grumpy ogre who just wants to be back in his swamp(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: Engaging and brilliantly animated adventure about a giant metal machine that drops from the sky onto a small town in 1958 Maine, frightening almost everyone witless but befriending a small boy named Hogarth. Slowly, the iron giant finds its humanity and sets about changing the local people's perceptions. Now all Hogarth has to do is hide the Iron Giant from his mother Annie and the authorities who, with the Cold War at its height, determine that the massive being is a threat that must be destroyed all costs(n)

programme.title: Movie: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: The Power Rangers must stop the evil space pirate Divatox from releasing the powerful Maligore from his volcanic imprisonment(n)

programme.title: Movie: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: If you could talk to the child that you used to be, what advice would you give him? That question forms the basis of this comic fantasy. Forty-year-old Russ Duritz (Bruce Willis) is a wealthy and powerful "image consultant" who has made a career out of telling people how to present themselves. But while he's a success in business, he's a failure in life; he's vain, mean-spirited, and hasn't been able to hold onto a marriage (or even a pet dog). One day, Russ is startled to meet Rusty (Spencer Breslin), a stocky kid whom he soon realizes is himself at the age of eight, having passed through a wrinkle in time. Young Rusty doesn't seem much happier than the grown-up Russ, so the older man takes his younger self under his wing and tries to teach him how to avoid the mistakes he's made, while Rusty encourages Russ to be a more caring human being. Along the way, Russ and Rusty become friends, and realize how much they can learn from each other. Disney's The Kid also stars Jean Smart as one of Russ' clients, Lily Tomlin as his assistant, and Daniel Von Bargen as his father(n)

programme.title: Movie: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: A look at Ridley Scott's spectacular new take on the story of Moses(n)

programme.title: Movie: Sleeping With the Fishes
programme.desc: This quirky comedy follows a recently widowed woman's return to her hometown, where she reunites with her Latino Jewish family. Despite her grief and confusion, their eccentricities carry her through the difficult time(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Can late-night radio host Leon Phelps find his mystery sugar momma and avoid the wrath of an angry mob of husbands? Only one way to find out!(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lean on Me
programme.desc: Factually based story of an American high-school principal who sets about knocking his delinquent students into shape and is not averse to taking a swing with a baseball bat(n)

programme.title: Movie: Ricochet
programme.desc: Ricochet, a suspenseful, exciting police thriller that loses its way at the end, is the story of a good cop whose life is destroyed by an obsessed psychotic criminal whom he sent to prison years before. Nick (Denzel Washington) is a successful happily married police officer with a distinguished record. He is drugged, kidnapped and framed by Blake (John Lithgow) who has never forgiven him for arresting him years before. Nick must redeem himself both to the police force, his family and the public who had come to love and respect him. Denzel Washington is excellent in his role of the good man in an impossible situation. John Lithgow, while always interesting, is completely over-the-top as the psychotic criminal, and the film looses plausibility during an extended and highly improbable and unbelievable final chase sequence around the Watts Towers. Despite these flaws, Ricochet is an exiting suspense film with a fine performance by Washington and worth watching despite its disappointing conclusion(n)

programme.title: Movie: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A high school girl falls for the new boy at school, but isn't allowed to date him until she finds someone to court her non- conformist sister(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Divergent Series: Insurgent'
programme.desc: A look at "The Divergent Series: Insurgent," the 2015 sequel to "Divergent" (2014) that finds Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) on the run from the Erudite faction. The film also stars Kate Winslet and Octavia Spencer, and is directed by Robert Schwentke(n)

programme.title: Movie: May
programme.desc: A young social outcast goes to great measures to find the perfect friend in this debut horror feature from director Lucky McKee. Set apart from her peers as a child due to her lazy eye, May's only friend and confidant was a delicate doll encased in glass. Though as a young adult May has learned to control her lazy eye with glasses and contacts, her introverted tendencies always seem to hinder her search for the perfect friend. Walking down the street one day, May happens across a young man tenderly caressing the damage of a wrecked car and falls in love with his seemingly perfect hands. As May and Adam (Jeremy Sisto) begin to spend more time together, the quirky couple seem to have much in common, and May believes that she might have finally happened across the perfect boy. Her deep-rooted psychological problems slowly surface, however, and Adam is gradually driven away, leaving the vulnerable May in the company of amorous co-worker Polly (Anna Faris). It soon becomes obvious to May that, though various acquaintances seem to have perfect traits, they never add up to a perfect whole -- leading the creative and demented young girl to her own unique method of creating the perfect friend(n)

programme.title: Movie: Firewall
programme.desc: Action thriller, starring Harrison Ford and Paul Bettany, following a security expert who is forced by a businessman holding his family at gunpoint to steal 100 million dollars from a bank guarded by one of his defence systems(n)

programme.title: Movie: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Good Son
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a small boy who terrorises his friends and family(n)

programme.title: Movie: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organisation. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg and Taylor Kitsch star in this compelling war film depicting a real-life 2005 Navy SEALS operation in Afghanistan. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2014)(117 mins)(n)

programme.title: Movie: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Movie: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn Wade sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses, funky music, a hot onboard dance club, and a bathroom attendant(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: A young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal(n)

programme.title: Tig Notaro: Boyish Girl Interrupted
programme.desc: Comedian Tig Notaro performs at the Wilbur Theatre in Boston. Topics include doing shows in Las Vegas; introducing her fiancée to her family in Mississippi; TSA screenings; small planes; Santa Claus; and misleading text messages. Taped May 31, 2015(n)

programme.title: Movie: Brick
programme.desc: A tough-talking teen attempts to uncover his ex-girlfriend's killer in director Rian Johnson's hard-boiled high-school noir, told in the style of a Dashiell Hammett mystery. An outsider by nature, Brendan (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is forced to penetrate the elaborate ranks of the high-school social scene and its more insidious underbelly when the body of his former girlfriend Emily is found lying lifeless in a remote creek. Though the pair had been on the outs, Brendan can't seem to shake the hysterical phone call that he received from Emily the day before her body was discovered, a call in which she rattled off a number of cryptic words: "brick," "pin," "tug," "poor Frisco." He's determined to find the guilty party, and to do that he'll need to uncover the meaning behind her enigmatic phone call. From the highest-ranking athlete to the lowest-level burnout, no one is above suspicion of leaving her in that creek or putting her in the position to end up there. Brendan's skill for getting the right attention from the right people leads him to a local drug dealer of urban-legendary status (Lukas Haas), who walks with a cane and lives with his mother. As Brendan infiltrates the social and political web more deeply, his theory solidifies and each player's role becomes clear, from the shifty-eyed pot slinger to an upper-crust innocent who may well be a femme fatale. Brendan may soon be ready to make his case, even if it's too late for him to get out(n)

programme.title: Movie: Back on Board: Greg Louganis
programme.desc: A documentary profiling the four-time Olympic gold-medal winning diver and one of America's first openly gay athletes. The film chronicles his successes, the discrimination he has faced, his struggles for financial security and his return to the sport(n)

programme.title: Movie: Amor en Alquiler
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant, acting as a surrogate mother for a childless couple, falls for a doctor. Costar Martita Roca also performs songs on the soundtrack(n)

programme.title: Movie: Rumor Has It
programme.desc: Comedy from director Rob Reiner and executive producer Steven Soderbergh. Jennifer Aniston discovers her family may have inspired 'The Graduate'. Also with Kevin Costner, Shirley MacLaine(n)

programme.title: Movie: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Comedy drama. A former CIA agent decides to write his memoirs, but his wife copies his work onto a disc which is accidentally left at a health club. Two unscrupulous employees of the club discover the information and decide to exploit it for their own ends, but little do they realise the extent of the complex and highly dangerous situation they are entering(n)

programme.title: Movie: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration in this hilarious buddy film(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Latin Explosion: A New America
programme.desc: John Leguizamo narrates a look at the growing influence of Latino culture and music in the U.S. from the 1950s to the 21st century that features footage of vintage performances and remarks by artists and entertainers, including Marc Anthony, Gloria Estefan, José Feliciano, Eva Longoria, Jennifer Lopez, Ricky Martin, Rita Moreno, Pitbull, Shakira and Sofía Vergara(n)

programme.title: Movie: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up 80's pop star, Alex Fletcher has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. His chance to go back into the spotlight comes when teen idol Cora Corman invites him to write and record a duet with her. Trouble is, he's good at melodies but needs a lyricist and has less than a week to finish. That's when Sophie Fisher comes into the scene: besides watering Alex's plants, she's a pretty good poet. But has been a little reluctant to collaborate with any male after the end of her relationship(n)

programme.title: Movie: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Set in 1960s Detroit, Dreamgirls follows the commercial and cultural struggles of the R&B recording industry, through the rise of the Dreamettes from backup singers to headlining international superstars. The trio--Deena, Effie, and Lorrell--soon discover the harsh reality behind the glamour of fame and fortune, as the group's controlling and shady manager uses them to help build his musical empire..(n)

programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration in this hilarious buddy film(n)

Bush, who discusses the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR). Also: Suroosh Alvi travels to Rwanda with U2's Bono to see PEPFAR in action(n)

(cc)(n)

programme.title: Carnal Wishes
programme.desc: An erotic tale rich with passion and double-crosses. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier (Luke Wilson) who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard. Directed by Mike Judge, who co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: This Is All We Are. In the Season 2 finale, Thackery ignores Zinberg's advice at Mt. Sinai and undertakes a risky, alternative course of action; Cornelia confronts Henry about the family business; Barrow's actions at the hospital construction site are called into question; Gallinger ponders a job opportunity; and Cleary steadfastly refuses to give up on Harriet(n)

programme.title: Movie: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled private eye investigates a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Meanwhile, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan is a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Geoffrey Rush, whose wife works for the government. Rush, reluctantly blackmailed into providing intelligence, offers Brosnan increasingly lurid stories which, embellished again and sent to London, create a political incident that begins to spiral out of control(n)

programme.title: Movie: Rapid Fire
programme.desc: Jake Lo, is a college student who must use his lethal self-defence skills to stay alive. After witnessing a killing by a Mafia kingpin, Jake is pursued by smugglers, mobsters and crooked Feds. Only when he takes the law into his own hands, with the help of a renegade government agent and his stunning sidekick, does Jake have a chance of survival. 'Rapid Fire' turns on the heat with awesome, electrifying martial arts scenes and a fast paced action adventure plot(n)

programme.title: Movie: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: The thrills never stop when a NYC heroin trafficker hires a haunted ex-cop to find the men who abducted and killed his wife. But as the sleuth gets closer to his targets, he realizes that they're much more sinister than he could have imagined(n)

programme.title: Movie: Hulk
programme.desc: An ambitious adaptation of the Marvel comic about a genetically mutated scientist whose massive green alter ego is targeted by the military(n)

programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen(n)

programme.title: Movie: McHale's Navy
programme.desc: Comedy adventure based on the 1960s American TV series of the same name. The titular naval commander and his men lead a charmed life on a sleepy Caribbean island until a maniacal terrorist invades a neighbouring island(n)

programme.title: Movie: Breach
programme.desc: A rookie FBI agent is assigned to catch out a powerful senior agent suspected of espionage(n)

programme.title: Movie: Rush Hour
programme.desc: Action comedy following the attempts of a martial-arts-expert cop to retrieve the kidnapped daughter of the Chinese consul, a mission hindered by the presence of a happless LAPD detective. Named by the consul as the only man capable of saving his little girl, the supercop finds opposition in the form of the FBI, who bring in the rogue detective to keep him away from the action(n)

programme.title: Movie: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit(n)

programme.title: Movie: Jumper
programme.desc: Superb special effects propel this mind-bending sci-fi trip about a young man (Hayden Christensen) with the power to teleport himself anywhere on the planet. Life is a blast for him, until the arrival of a mysterious tracker (Samuel L. Jackson) from a secret society that is out to capture his kind and others like him. Directed by Doug Liman and written by David S. Goyer, Jim Uhls and Simon Kinberg, who adapted the script from Steven Gould's young-adult best sellers "Jumper" and "Exile."(n)

programme.title: Movie: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: The mythical story of Vlad the Impaler's transformation into Dracula is revealed. As the Turkish invade Romania, Vlad goes to the greatest of lengths to fight for his homeland, even if it means selling his soul and becoming forever doomed as a creature of the night(n)

programme.title: Movie: Secretary
programme.desc: Lee Holloway is a bright woman in her twenties who after a short stay in a mental hospital gets a job as a secretary at a local law firm. She develops a crush on her older boss and they begin a rather bizarre relationship where Lee allows her hidden masochism to flourish which ultimately leads to self affirmation. Winner of the Special Jury Prize at the Sundance Film Festival and for Best First Screenplay at the Independent Spirit Awards(n)

programme.title: Movie: Love Potion No. 9
programme.desc: When it comes to love, Paul Matthews and Diane Farrow, two highly educated and talented scientists don't know a thing. Despite the fact that they are neighbors, share the same interests and both are psychobiologists who study primates, neither is really aware of the other romantically until Paul, who is terribly shy around women, goes to gypsy Madame Ruth in desperation and asks for help. She reads his palm and tells him that he needs a woman; she then hands him Love Potion No. 8 which will attract women like flies to honey. After experimenting on animals, both Paul and Diane decide to try it on themselves... with hilarious and charming results!(n)

programme.title: Movie: Endless Love
programme.desc: The life of a shy teen changes overnight when a charming but aimless mechanic asks her out. Can their relationship survive her dad's disapproval?(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Salton Sea
programme.desc: Danny Parker is a crystal meth addict in LA, hanging out with his junkie friends and earning money on the side as an informant. In a world where parties go on for days and they frequently can't tell whether it's night or day, Danny questions whether these people are his real friends. But is Danny everything he seems? Starring Val Kilmer, Vincent D'Onofrio, Peter Sarsgaard, Adam Goldberg, Doug Hutchison, Anthony LaPaglia(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Life of David Gale
programme.desc: David Gale is a man who has tried to live by his principles, but in a bizarre twist of fate this devoted father, popular professor and respected death penalty opponent finds himself on Death Row for the rape and murder of fellow-activist Constance Hallaway. With only three days before his scheduled execution, Gale agrees to give Pulitzer-hungry reporter Elizabeth Bitsey Bloom the interview she has been chasing(n)

programme.title: Movie: Frantic
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars in Roman Polanski's breathtaking thriller involving a man's desperate search for his missing wife. Paris provides the backdrop to the film's visual beauty and extra atmosphere is added with a superb score by Ennio Morricone(n)

programme.title: Movie: Lost in Space
programme.desc: Update of the '60s TV show about a futuristic family travelling to a distant planet, unaware that a spy has sabotaged their journey(n)

programme.title: Movie: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy teenager, dominated by a religiously fanatic mother, suffers at the hands of high-school bullies, whose mean pranks rile the teen into discovering she has telekinetic powers, which she uses to take ultimate revenge at the prom(n)

programme.title: Movie: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends inadvertently stir a dark force while attempting to contact their late pal through a Ouija board(n)

programme.title: Movie: Queen of the Damned
programme.desc: Aaliyah stars in her final role as Akasha Queen of the Vampires who, after being awakened by the vampire Lestat, sets her sights on making him her king and ruling the world(n)

programme.title: Movie: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: A bereaved mother becomes obsessed with getting revenge upon the acquitted psychopath who raped and murdered her teen-age daughter in this taut crime melodrama. The killer, Robert Doob, performed his unspeakable act in the girl's own living room. Her mother, Karen McCann, is unable to get over her rage and grief. At first Karen's husband, the girl's step father, is also enraged and deeply sad, but as time passes he attempts to repress it so he can continue on with his life. But Karen, who was at Doob's trial and saw how his high-powered lawyer helped get him acquitted, cannot let go and so begins to follow Doob. At one point, she sees him canvassing the home of his next intended victim. Despite her warnings, the law dictates that the police are impotent to stop him. Sure enough, Doob kills again. Karen gets involved in a support group for murdered children and during those meetings comes to realize that some of the other parents are not content to sit back and passively watch as justice is undone. Karen begins to reconsider her strong feelings against vigilantism and decides its time she do something to keep Doob from killing again. To prepare she begins with Karate practice and learns to use a gun. Expect a surprising bittersweet ending(n)

programme.title: Movie: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: James Wong (THE ONE), director of the original FINAL DESTINATION film, returns to direct the third instalment in the series, FINAL DESTINATION 3. High-school senior, Wendy (Mary Elizabeth Winstead), is enjoying senior night at the amusement park and taking photos for the school yearbook. As a control freak, she's not particularly fond of rides, especially the roller coaster. Despite her fear, Wendy decides to take the plunge, but is soon traumatised by a vision that a fatal accident is about to occur. Heeding caution, she and a group of her classmates, disembark from the ride and watch as the remaining thrill-seekers suffer a horrific fate. Having cheated death once, Wendy is tormented by an ominous feeling that something is very wrong. Her classmate, Kevin (Ryan Merriman), does some research and learns that something similar has happened before: a high-school student had a premonition that a plane filled with his classmates was doomed; a group of them refused to board, and the plane exploded in flight. Following that incident, the survivors all died under mysterious circumstances, their deaths following the same order as in the premonition. Wendy and Kevin realise that the same fate is about to befall all those who survived the rollercoaster. Perhaps more disturbing is that clues to the impending deaths seem to lie in the photos that Wendy took on the evening of the accident. In an instant, innocuous situations and common objects become fatal, causing particularly gruesome deaths. Ultimately, the real question becomes whether or not Wendy and Kevin can save their classmates and themselves from impending doom, before it is too late(n)

programme.title: Movie: Non-Stop
programme.desc: A troubled air marshal has to play hero when he receives a text message claiming someone on his plane will be killed unless the sender receives $150million(n)

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: Fearless storm chasers risk their lives in order to collect data on an unprecedented weather pattern that unleashes multiple tornadoes on a small town. Meanwhile, the terrified locals race for shelter. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Barbershop 2 Back in Business
programme.desc: A Chicago barber tries to prevent a greedy land developer from getting his shop in this sequel. (cc)(n)

programme.title: 300 Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: The Persian Empire's quest for dominance continues following their victory over the Spartans. With Xerxes and Artemisia leading a massive army toward Athens, Greek general Themistokles prepares his naval fleet for a decisive battle. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Movie: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: 10,000 Saints is a coming-of-age drama from directors Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini (American Splendor) set in 1988, centering around a Vermont teenager named Jude (Asa Butterfield) who moves to Manhattan with his drug-dealing father, Les (Ethan Hawke), with whom he has a strained relationship. On the heels of a night of partying that leads to his best friend dying from a drug overdose, Jude gets closer to new friend Eliza (Hailee Steinfeld) and his deceased friend's half-brother (Emile Hirsch), all while falling deeper into the city's burgeoning punk scene and its straight-edge fans. The film co-stars Emily Mortimer as Les' girlfriend, and Julianne Nicholson as Jude's adoptive mother(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Guardian
programme.desc: An inner city thriller with a supernatural twist, GUARDIAN stars Mario Van Peebles as an LA cop named John Kross. Kross was in the Marines during the Gulf War, where he witnessed the release of a deadly supernatural force. Now, he and his partner Carpenter (James Remar) have discovered that the newest street drug in LA, called Chaos, is linked to this otherworldly power, and it is creating a wave of deadly violence throughout the city(n)

programme.title: Movie: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Cosmic outlaws face an interstellar villain who seeks to control the universe with a powerful orb in the most-outrageous space adventure ever to hit the big screen. Together, Peter Quill, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Gamora and Drax the Destroyer may be the galaxy's only hope for thwarting Ronan's sinister plan(n)

programme.title: Movie: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Everyone's favorite bumbling mall cop returns in this sequel from Happy Madison and director Andy Fickman. Original Paul Blart: Mall Cop screenwriters Kevin James and Nick Bakay reteam to pen the script, which finds Paul Blart (James) and his daughter Maya in Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. When a band of menacing art thieves attempt a daring heist, Blart attempts to stop them with the help of the cynical casino security staff who once ridiculed him. Meanwhile, Blart contends with a crafty rival (Nicholas Turturro)(n)

programme.title: Movie: Aloha
programme.desc: In this hilarious romantic comedy, a military-defense contractor is rehired by his former boss to oversee the launch of a satellite in Hawaii. He reconnects with an old flame while there, but finds himself increasingly drawn to an Air Force pilot assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Wild
programme.desc: A cuddly koala who wants to be fierce, a squirrel in love with a sarcastic giraffe, an addle-pated anaconda, and a lion with a secret set off from their cozy zoo to rescue the lion's adolescent cub from an accidental kidnapping(n)

programme.title: Movie: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: John Moore's remake of the 1965 classic stars Dennis Quaid as pilot Frank Towns who crash lands his plane in the Gobi desert with a mixed package of passengers and no hope of rescue. Giovanni Ribisi plays Elliott, the enigmatic engineer who persuades the survivors they can scavenge enough from the crashed plane to build another to fly them to safety, while a love interest is provided by Miranda Otto as the tough yet vulnerable Kelly. Superbly photographed by Brendan Galvin, this stands against the original, with the mix of characters providing the drama and the take-off of the cobbled-together aircraft a nail-biting climax(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A talented though weird New York family comes together around their dying dad. But is he really unwell? Offbeat black comedy with a superb cast and a great soundtrack(n)

programme.title: Movie: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Josh Hartnett star in a WWII blockbuster from the director of Transformers. A US pilot travels to Britain to fight in the war just before the Japanese attack(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Monuments Men
programme.desc: Seven WWII-era art experts go behind enemy lines in Germany to recover priceless artifacts stolen by the Nazis before Hitler orders them to be destroyed(n)

programme.title: Movie: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: Set in the 1920s French Riviera, this romantic comedy follows a surprising series of events that occur when a master magician tries to expose a psychic as a fraud(n)

programme.desc: Comedy drama about a Jewish shopkeeper imprisoned in a ghetto in wartime Poland who overhears some interesting news and passes it on. The rumour grows that there is a secret radio and Jakob decides to invent optimistic news in order to cheer up his fellow prisoners(n)

programme.desc: Jim Sheridan's Oscar-nominated drama stars Paddy Considine as Johnny, a would-be actor, who emigrates from Ireland to New York with his wife Sarah and daughters Christy and Ariel. While he searches for work, his wife tries to keep the family above the poverty line, with their lives complicated by enigmatic neighbour Mateo, who alternates between rages and affection for the family(n)

programme.title: Movie: Manhattan Murder Mystery
programme.desc: Carol Lipton's suspicious nature triggers a spot of amateur sleuthing. She reckons that the kindly old guy next door has bumped off his wife. Larry Lipton doesn't want anything to do with it, but is drawn into the mystery. Lovingly crafted comedy from Woody Allen with nods to Nancy Drew plus some good gags(n)

programme.title: Movie: Danny Deckchair
programme.desc: Jeff Balsmeyer makes his writing and directing debut with the Australian romantic comedy Danny Deckchair. Rhys Ifans plays Danny Morgan, a building tradesman living in the Sydney suburbs with his upwardly mobile real-estate agent girlfriend, Trudy (Justine Clarke). When she chooses to postpone their vacation together in order to show a house to TV personality Sandy Upman (Rhys Muldoon), Danny takes matters into his own hands by fastening helium balloons to a chair and sailing over the city. Landing in the small town of Clarence, he meets and falls in love with parking cop Glenda (Miranda Otto)(n)

programme.title: Movie: Drive Me Crazy
programme.desc: Nicole is fashionable and popular, Chase is geeky and shy. But they do have one thing in common: they have both been unlucky in love. Cue romance and comedy from the star of Sabrina The Teenage Witch(n)

programme.title: Movie: My Bodyguard
programme.desc: Youth-oriented comedy drama about the adventures of a new student who enrolls in a high school run by a teen-age gang. He hires a bodyguard to protect him. Climax includes an unforgettable fight(n)

programme.title: Movie: Mo' Money
programme.desc: Trying to get his act together, a con artist gets a job in a credit card company(n)

programme.title: Movie: Are You Here
programme.desc: Slacker receives a large inheritance following his dad's death(n)

programme.title: Movie: Real Genius
programme.desc: Val Kilmer is on top comic form as one of a team of young science prodigies who develop a super-powered laser beam. But as our heroes stretch their intellects with hilarious stunts, their teacher has a darker purpose for the laser..(n)

programme.title: Movie: Dirty Work
programme.desc: In this comedy, smart-aleck Mitch Weaver and his buddy Sam McKenna open a revenge-for-hire business in order to raise $50,000 so Sam's father can get a heart transplant. However, millionaire Travis Cole is bothered when Mitch and Sam interfere with his plan to wipe a woman's home out of existence(n)

programme.title: Movie: Dirty Love
programme.desc: A sexy woman discovers just how hard it can be to find a worthwhile man in this outrageous romantic comedy. Rebecca (Jenny McCarthy) is a beautiful blonde who thinks she has it made with her hunky boyfriend, Richard (Victor Webster); however, when she comes home early one day and finds him in bed with another woman, she realizes that isn't quite the case. Devastated, Rebecca takes the advice of her friends Carrie (Kam Heskin), a half-bright actress, and Michelle (Carmen Electra), a racially confused beautician, and throws herself back into the dating game to prove to Richard that she can do better. However, there's a problem -- Rebecca is a bit of a klutz, she keeps ending up with men who are either crazy or strange, and each date she goes on ends in disaster. Does Rebecca have any chance at either finding new love or winning Richard back? And is it possible her pal John (Eddie Kaye Thomas) might be interested in being more than just friends? Dirty Love was written by leading lady Jenny McCarthy and directed by John Asher, McCarthy's then-husband(n)

programme.title: Movie: Overboard
programme.desc: A wealthy, obnoxious woman hires a carpenter to do some work on her yacht. When the two don't see eye-to-eye, the carpenter is left unpaid, while the woman, Joanna, sets sail. The following day, after falling overboard, Joanna's fished out of the sea. When she is diagnosed with amnesia, the carpenter sees a great way to regain the money she owes him... he tells Joanna she's his wife; that way he gets a free housekeeper(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Contractor
programme.desc: Top CIA assassin becomes the prey after completing a mission to kill a terrorist leader in London(n)

programme.title: Movie: Buck and the Preacher
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier stars and directs this Western tale of a wagon master and a conman preacher helping freed slaves to resettle(n)

programme.title: Movie: Scary Movie 4
programme.desc: Cindy returns as the dim-witted heroine out to save the world from an alien invasion. Spoof-heavy comedy which rips the stuffing out of Hollywood blockbusters, featuring a series of all-star cameos(n)

programme.title: Movie: To Sir, With Love II
programme.desc: Made-for-TV sequel to the classic drama about an American teacher assigned to a rough London school. Returning to Chicago from Britain following his retirement, the inspirational instructor discovers that there is a deprived school near his new home that is crying out for a new teacher(n)

programme.title: Movie: Black and White
programme.desc: James Toback's film is a searing look at race, sex and hip hop in Manhattan, driven by a pulsing soundtrack. Rich Bower (Oliver 'Power' Grant from the Wu Tang Clan) decides to leave behind his life of crime and re-invent himself as a hip hop impresario, working for the first time in the white world. Documentary filmmaker Sam Donager (Brooke Shields) and her husband Terry (Robert Downey Jr) enter the scene, following a group of privileged, uptown teenagers (including Bijou Phillips and William Lee Scott) who, intrigued by Rich and his crowd, find themselves drawn to the hip hop lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Movie: Between Us
programme.desc: A tense reunion between two couples reopens old wounds of resentment and dysfunction(n)

programme.title: Movie: Soda Cracker
programme.desc: Soda Cracker is a tough Chicago cop whose partner is gunned down by a sniper. Soda's pursuit for vengeance takes him into Chicago's ruthless underground. The quest for the killer leads Soda right back to his own police department(n)

programme.title: Movie: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars in this extravagant period gangster comedy as a sharp, smart 'businessman' who is adopted by Harlem nightclub owner Sugar Ray ( Richard Pryor ). Before long, both men find themselves caught up in a Mob war when a gangster cuts in on their turf(n)

programme.title: Movie: Scary Movie 4
programme.desc: Cindy returns as the dim-witted heroine out to save the world from an alien invasion. Spoof-heavy comedy which rips the stuffing out of Hollywood blockbusters, featuring a series of all-star cameos(n)

programme.title: Movie: The Contractor
programme.desc: Top CIA assassin becomes the prey after completing a mission to kill a terrorist leader in London(n)

programme.title: Movie: About Last Night
programme.desc: Kevin Hart, Michael Ealy, Regina Hall and Joy Bryant star in this romcom following the fortunes of two new couples(n)

programme.title: Movie: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars in this extravagant period gangster comedy as a sharp, smart 'businessman' who is adopted by Harlem nightclub owner Sugar Ray ( Richard Pryor ). Before long, both men find themselves caught up in a Mob war when a gangster cuts in on their turf(n)

programme.title: Movie: White Nights
programme.desc: Adventure in which Mikhail Baryshnikov plays a Soviet ballet star who finds himself back in the USSR after a defection attempt misfires. In desperation, he teams up with an expatriate American tap dance and together they plot their bid to return to freedom(n)

programme.title: Da Vinci's Demons
programme.desc: Angelus Iratissimus. Leo and Sophia encounter problems trying to control their mysterious invention, while in Florence, Riario awaits a decision, and Lorenzo and Vanessa's partnership goes to the next level(n)

programme.title: Holy Night
programme.desc: The Christmas decorations in a house come alive at night, but are divided into two factions - Santa and his friends on the tree and the religious figures on the Nativity scene. When some of them go missing, both sides blame the other, but two of the ornaments team up to solve the mystery. Animated comedy, with the voice of Anabel Alonso.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Christmas
programme.desc: A teenager who is constantly being overlooked by his parents in favour of his younger and older brother finds himself reliving Christmas Day over and over again. He realises he can use his situation to ensure that his grandfather has a perfect day. Fantasy, starring Zachary Gordon, Molly Parker and Bruce Dern.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2015
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Saving Santa
programme.desc: Bernard, a clumsy elf working in Santa's reindeer stables, learns that his employer uses time travel to go all around the world in a single night. When mercenaries invade the North Pole looking to steal its magical secrets, Bernard goes back in time to stop them ever finding the place. Animated comedy, with the voices of Martin Freeman, Tim Curry, Joan Collins and Tom Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: A little girl residing in the Christmas-obsessed town of Whoville becomes fascinated with a grouchy creature living in the mountains. But her efforts to make him part of their celebrations leave him more bitter than ever, and he resolves to ruin the festive season. Fantasy comedy, based on Dr Seuss's children's book, with Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Jeffrey Tambor and Molly Shannon. Anthony Hopkins narrates.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Miser Ebenezer Scrooge is given a Christmas Eve to remember when a quartet of ghosts - his dead business partner and the spirits of Christmases past, present and future - turn up determined to cure him of his money-grubbing ways. Adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic, starring George C Scott, Nigel Davenport, Frank Finlay, Angela Pleasence, David Warner, Edward Woodward and Susannah York.(n)

programme.title: The Three Dogateers
programme.desc: Three pampered dogs re-imagine themselves as fearless `dogateers' after their owners leave them to guard the family home on Christmas Eve. When ruthless burglars break in and steal everything from the presents to the festive trimmings, Arfamis, Barkos and Wagos embark on a dangerous journey in search of Santa Claus, who might be the only person left who can save Christmas. Festive family adventure, starring Dean Cain, with the voices of Jesse Baget and Danielle Judovits.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2015
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: The Nativity Story
programme.desc: A woman is visited by an angel and told she is to give birth to the son of God. While pregnant, she is forced to accompany her husband on an arduous journey to his birthplace, where King Herod knows of the prophecy and fears the birth of the child - and will go to any lengths to prevent it. Biblical drama, with Keisha Castle-Hughes, Oscar Isaac and Ciaran Hinds.(n)

programme.title: Saving Santa
programme.desc: Bernard, a clumsy elf working in Santa's reindeer stables, learns that his employer uses time travel to go all around the world in a single night. Fantasy comedy, based on Dr Seuss's children's book, with Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Jeffrey Tambor and Molly Shannon. Anthony Hopkins narrates.(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: Bad Asses On The Bayou
programme.desc: Two ageing vigilantes team up and head to Louisiana to track down a kidnapped friend. Tongue-in-cheek action adventure, starring Danny Trejo, Danny Glover and John Amos.(n)

programme.title: The Marine 4: Moving Target
programme.desc: Hard-bitten marine Jake Carter is ordered to protect a beautiful whistleblower. She has evidence that will prove a powerful military defence contractor is corrupt, and is willing to put her life on the line to do so. Action thriller sequel, starring Mike 'The Miz' Mizanin, Summer Rae and Melissa Roxburgh.(n)

programme.title: Dino Time
programme.desc: Three children accidentally activate a time-travel device which transports them 65 million years back in time, where they are protected by a friendly dinosaur. But can they find a way to return to the 21st century while steering clear of all sorts of prehistoric dangers? Animation, featuring the voices of Melanie Griffith, Pamela Adlon and Tara Strong.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphaned girl is treated as a servant by her cruel stepmother and her two daughters. Her life is changed for ever by the intervention of a kindly fairy godmother, who gives her the opportunity to attend a lavish royal and win the heart of a handsome prince. Romantic fantasy, starring Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden and Helena Bonham Carter.(n)

programme.title: Dino Time

Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.(n)

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two sisters who have not spoken in years bury the hatchet when they learn their mother and father have split up. They plan to push their parents back together by organising a family Christmas celebration in the house they grew up in. The only problem is that someone else lives there now. Family drama, starring real-life sisters Carly and Britt McKillip.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2015
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs Bizarro League
programme.desc: Animated action-adventure, with the voices of Diedrich Bader and Nolan North. Superman and the Justice League team up with their Bizarro League counterparts to thwart Darkseid's attempt to conquer the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Fairytale: Story of the Seven Dwarves
programme.desc: A princess is cursed by a witch that she and her entire kingdom will sleep for 100 years starting from her 18th birthday. When the spell takes effect, a band of plucky dwarves goes in search of the one man who can save her - but he is being held captive by a dragon. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joshua Graham and Katja Bruegger.(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel.(n)

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price.(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A submarine captain working for a salvage company is laid off, and attempts to turn his fortunes around by recovering a lost treasure rumoured to have sunk to the depths of the Black Sea. However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker.(n)

However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel.(n)

However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker.(n)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: The infamous scientist's monster roams the Earth 200 years after burying his creator, and is drawn into an ancient supernatural conflict. Two factions of magical beings are at war, and the key to ending the conflict lies in tapping the secret of the creature's immortality. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy and Miranda Otto.(n)

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Steve Jobs, following his rise from college drop-out to the founder of Apple computers, and how years later, he would return to the company he started and reinvent it as one of the world's most influential companies, with far-reaching effects on the development of technology. Starring Ashton Kutcher and Dermot Mulroney.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A college student finds himself stranded in the middle of the desert dressed in a Santa suit - the result of a prank by his classmates. He faces no end of unexpected obstacles as he makes a cross-country journey to be with his family for the festive season. Comedy, starring Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Jessica Biel, Adam LaVorgna and Gary Cole.(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: A slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer succeeds the British throne when a freak accident wipes out the entire royal family. A loyal aristocrat desperately tries to stop the loud-mouthed American unwittingly bringing the monarchy into disrepute, while a scheming lord plots to make his reign a short one. Comedy, starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole, John Hurt and Richard Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: A socially awkward young groom-to-be hires a professional best man to make him look good at his forthcoming wedding. Convincing his fiancee and guests that they really do know each other proves to be problematic, but at least a real friendship begins to develop between the mismatched pair. Comedy, starring Josh Gad, Kevin Hart and Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting.(n)

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Two party-mad bachelors make the most of the romantic atmosphere as they gatecrash weddings to pick up women. With a catalogue of tall stories to tell guests, the pair are regularly the hit of the events they attend - until one of them falls for a bridesmaid and they both learn a few things about love. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams and Isla Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A ruthless millionaire hires a prostitute while on a business trip. Realising she may be useful in helping him keep up a successful appearance, he pays her to accompany him for a week as he associates with the rich and powerful - but falls in love despite their many differences. Romantic comedy, starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, with Ralph Bellamy and Laura San Giacomo.(n)

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: An American football team's waterboy puts up with constant ridicule from the players. But one day his anger gets the better of him and he demonstrates an unexpected talent for tackling - so the coach gives him a chance to prove his worth on the pitch. However, he has to keep his blossoming sporting career a secret from his overprotective mother. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler and Fairuza Balk.(n)

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monastery's financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera.(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: A slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer succeeds the British throne when a freak accident wipes out the entire royal family. A loyal aristocrat desperately tries to stop the loud-mouthed American unwittingly bringing the monarchy into disrepute, while a scheming lord plots to make his reign a short one. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams and Isla Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa.5
programme.desc: Compilation of additional footage from the hidden camera comedy about a depraved old man taking his grandson on a road trip, including behind the scenes footage examining the film's old-age make-up effects and the way the crew was concealed from the unsuspecting public. Starring Johnny Knoxville and Jackson Nicoll.(n)

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon.(n)

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: A man is chosen by God to build an ark capable of housing his family and pairs of every living creature when the world is flooded. However, Noah's mission is complicated by his adopted daughter Ila, and the villainous Tubal-cain, who plans on storming the vessel to escape the Creator's vengeance. Biblical epic, starring Russell Crowe, Ray Winstone and Emma Watson.(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Roman general Maximus Decimus Meridius is a casualty of a power struggle between the corrupt Emperor Commodus and the senate. Ordered to be put to death along with his family, he escapes his would-be killers but is sold into slavery as a gladiator - but uses his fame in the arena to fight against the tyrant. Oscar-winning period epic, with Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Derek Jacobi and Oliver Reed, in his last film role.(n)

programme.title: Taken 3 - Extended Cut
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Bryan Mills' efforts to finally live a quiet life are shattered by the death of his ex-wife. Just when things seemingly can't get any worse, he is framed for her murder and must fight to clear his name. Action thriller sequel, starring Liam Neeson, Forest Whitaker and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Noah

Just when things seemingly can't get any worse, he is framed for her murder and must fight to clear his name. Action thriller sequel, starring Liam Neeson, Forest Whitaker and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Exorcist John Constantine is cursed with the ability to see spirits stalking the Earth, and grudgingly takes on the forces of evil, hoping his actions will earn him a place in heaven. However, he is told he has terminal cancer and time for salvation is running out - unless a policewoman investigating her twin sister's death can find the key to saving his soul. Supernatural thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz and Tilda Swinton.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
programme.desc: One of Tinker Bell's friends meets a large hairy monster, and discovers he is not as fearsome as he looks. However, she has a hard time convincing the other fairies to accept him, and needs the help of her friends to protect the creature. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Ginnifer Goodwin and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A wicked witch agrees to lift a curse on a young couple if they will help restore her once beautiful looks. Based on Stephen Sondheim's hit stage musical, the plot also entwines the fairy tale stories of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel. Musical fantasy, starring Meryl Streep, Johnny Depp, James Corden and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: An evil witch places a curse on an infant princess that will cause her to fall into eternal sleep on her 16th birthday. Her three fairy godmothers try unsuccessfully to protect her from the enchantment, and it falls to a brave prince to revive her from her slumber. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Mary Costa and Eleanor Audley.(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.(n)

programme.title: Mickey's Twice Upon a Christmas
programme.desc: Anthology of five festive animated tales featuring the Disney characters, including Donald Duck being forced to get into the spirit of things by his friends. With the voices of Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo and Bill Farmer.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles
