Concluding instalment of the thriller, following the story of a prison officer who is forced on the run with a young female prisoner when his daughter is kidnapped. Starring Philip Glenister, Rosie Cavaliero, MyAnna Buring and Nathan Stewart-Jarrett. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A single woman begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mother's infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer. Romantic comedy based on Helen Fielding's novel, starring Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer go hunting for two family homes in the north of England. New parents Karen and Chris are keen to return to their roots in the villages around Darlington, Co Durham, with baby Amelia. Kris and Heather have put wedding and holiday plans on hold until they find a house, but they are having trouble deciding between the city, the country or the coast.(n)

programme.title: Small Animal Hospital
programme.desc: Entertainer John Barrowman observes sick pets being treated in Glasgow, including a Standard Poodle with a non-standard gait, and a greedy pig in urgent need of exercise.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray accidentally kills Ally's pet hamster while the kids are away from home for the weekend, so Debra insists they give it a dignified funeral. Comedy, starring Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy tries to return his new brother to the baby shop, helped by Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil - but the friends get lost in dense woodlands en route, turning their expedition into a scary and exciting journey of discovery. Animated comedy based on the TV series, with the voices of Elizabeth Daily, Christine Cavanaugh, Kath Soucie, Whoopi Goldberg and Busta Rhymes.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton (Bob Newhart) contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls' night in making home-made jewellery. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting.(n)

programme.title: Space Chimps 2: Zartog Strikes Back
programme.desc: A chimp working at ground control on the space program longs to be an astronaut, and gets his wish when he is accidentally blasted into space. As his fellow apes try to find a way to bring him home, an evil alien tyrant escapes from captivity seeking revenge. Animated sci-fi comedy sequel, with the voices of Zack Shada and Tom Kenny.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Four tales celebrating the festive season. Bart hatches a plan to hold Santa Claus hostage, while in a 1940s-set story, Lisa refuses to give in to the holiday spirit until her mother returns home safe from the Battle of the Bulge. Home improvement expert Martha Stewart helps a desperate Marge, and Katy Perry leads the family in a rendition of The 39 Days of Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager spends the summer in a lake house with his family, where he finds an invasion force of tiny aliens lurking in the attic. The extraterrestrials plan to take over the world with a mind-controlling device - and since it only works on adults, it falls to the boy and his siblings to save the day. Children's sci-fi comedy, with Carter Jenkins and Austin Butler.(n)

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Contestants try to beat the banker and guess the contents of mystery boxes to win a big-money prize. In a game-changing twist, players could now win up to £500,000 by doubling their winnings with box 23 - if they are brave enough to buy it with what they have already won. Presented by Noel Edmonds.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Dictionary Corner guest Sir Tim Rice.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: In Sheffield, pawnbroker Dan tries to get a deal on a paraglider and is impressed by an Indian diamond bracelet, while in London, Charlie and Patrick test ride a narrowboat.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: A festive celebrity special of the culinary competition, featuring actress Danniella Westbrook, who hopes to get everyone into the celebratory spirit by throwing a panto party, while 1980s pop star Sinitta vies with choreographer Louie Spence for the affections of Made in Chelsea heart-throb Hugo Taylor. Sinitta has her work cut out though, especially as her own food offering may actually be inedible.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa despairs that she has never enjoyed the popularity Bart has, and ghost-writes positive things about herself on the school blog. But when the plan backfires, she finds herself at a new low - until none other than Lady Gaga rocks up in Springfield to show her what fame and celebrity is all about.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Ziggy gives Peri's present to Leela, but when she can smell gas and is locked in, he has to act fast to try and save her. Meanwhile, John Paul asks Ste to meet him, Reenie panics she will be sent back to prison after an incident in Price Slice, and Lisa decides to tell Zack the truth about her feelings.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story OF TERROR
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated Halloween special, in which the Toy Story characters spend a spooky night at a roadside motel. When one of the playthings goes missing, the others set out to find them before they suffer a similar fate. With the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn at Christmas
programme.desc: Prestige Pawnbrokers managing director James is struggling to get into the festive spirit, until a day out at the track with world superbike champion Carl Fogarty lifts his spirits and secures him a charity deal. Meanwhile, a former Miss England wants to trade in her diamonds for a new life in the United States, and Lawrence gets excited when a Falklands veteran turns up with a piece of Prince Charles and Princess Diana's 34-year-old wedding cake.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: In an edition of the documentary focusing on fathers and sons, 51-year-old builder Rod is rushed into A&E after falling 18 feet from scaffolding onto concrete. When scans reveal that he has fractured some of his vertebrae and will require extensive surgery, his wife Nicky is left to call their two sons to prepare them for bad news. Meanwhile, 86-year-old retired policeman John is brought to St Georges with a head injury after falling off a wall. As doctors assess the severity of the damage, he talks about how his career took over his life, so much so that he missed the birth of his son. Plus, 19-year-old cyclist Mack requires specialist help for a dislocated shoulder, after he collided with a Porsche. His dad explains how adopting him and his brother changed all of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: London is having the hottest weather since weather began, Ed's Australian nephew has come to stay, and the `Blue Spruce' furniture fad is spreading like wildfire. Meanwhile, Steven begs Jane to get him in at the Globe Theatre, and he is less than impressed with the director, Daz Klondyke. However, when he is cast in an all-dog version of Twelfth Night, he gets his fingers burnt during his quest to become a real actor. Conclusion of the third series of the comedy, starring Matt Berry, Doon Mackichan and Robert Bathurst. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted Christmas Special
programme.desc: This festive episode from 1996 finds the Craggy Island clerics and six other priests lost in what seems to be the world's largest lingerie department, with only Ted's quick thinking preventing the Catholic Church being rocked by a major scandal. His bravery earns him the coveted Golden Cleric award, which is when his troubles really begin. Comedy, starring Dermot Morgan, Ardal O'Hanlon and Frank Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: Dougal and Ted get involved in yet another bout of rivalry with their counterparts over on Rugged Island - this time by writing a song that will allow them the dubious honour of representing Ireland in the Eurovision-style music contest Eurosong. Ardal O'Hanlon and Dermot Morgan star.(n)

programme.title: The WotWots
programme.desc: The pair go hunting for a giant banana after the spaceship runs out of the fruit to make SpottyWot's drink. Narrated by Nicholas Parsons.(n)

programme.title: Chloe's Closet
programme.desc: Chloe helps Ida the spider to put on glasses so she can see well enough to play with her friends.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: The snowy weather is perfect for winter games, and Bull is determined to win a medal like the one that Lily found washed up on the beach.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Moose opens a winter theme park on a snowy day. Sarah and James sneak off to the frozen lake to skate as there is no ice rink - but Sam is called to their rescue after cracks appear and they become stranded.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Animation following the adventures of a seven-year-old girl who can talk to animals and tries to solve their problems. A penguin appears in Wissper's fridge and asks her to help find her baby.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa falls out with her best friend Suzy Sheep.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Skipper helps Pip put together a new radio-controlled plane, and they take it for a test flight on the beach, only for Shelvis to mistake it for a resting place.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.sub-title: I Want to Be a Vet.
programme.desc: The princess wants to become a vet, but finds looking after animals is harder than expected.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are asked to build the launch pad for Mei Moon's rocket, but the launch is in danger of being cancelled when Lofty makes a mistake.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Bash, Dash and Ferdinand decide to throw a Christmas party, but cause chaos on Misty Island.(n)

programme.title: Noddy in Toyland
programme.desc: The Little Skittles are excited about attending their first Domino Day.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly visits the elves' workshop as they make toys for Christmas, but a problem arises.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The pig and her friends are taught to ski by Madame Gazelle, who was once a world champion.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The playgroup goes to the theatre for a special festive performance.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The puppies have to find an escaped monkey, which ran away while being taken by train to the zoo.(n)

programme.title: Bananas in Pyjamas
programme.desc: The duo perform magic tricks for the Teddies, but Rat tries to upstage them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Dick and Dom.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: HP is excited about fireworks night, but does not realise quite how noisy it will be, so Toot helps him to enjoy the display. Animated series based on the book by Sebastien Braun.(n)

programme.title: Mr Men
programme.desc: Mr Grumpy gets annoyed, Miss Magic helps out in a restaurant kitchen and Mr Noisy tries to sell a vacuum cleaner.(n)

programme.title: Toby's Travelling Circus
programme.desc: Toby is inspired to create a ribbon-and-strings act in the show after witnessing the havoc caused by Momo and Freddo.(n)

programme.title: Angel at Christmas
programme.desc: Premiere. When Christmas wishes begin to come true, a young girl who longs for the father she never had meets a reclusive neighbour who may be able to help her. Family drama, starring Della Reese, Teri Polo and Tamera Mowry-Housley.(n)

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl finds an abandoned nest of goose eggs and raises the chicks when they hatch. As winter approaches, the birds need to fly south, so she and her inventor father construct a light aircraft to lead the way. Family adventure, starring Jeff Daniels, Anna Paquin, Dana Delany and Terry Kinney. Edited for Language.(n)

programme.title: World's Strongest Man 2015
programme.desc: The World Deadlift Championships. Action from the event, which took place at Headingley. Presented by James Richardson, Charlie Webster and Terry Hollands.(n)

programme.title: The Glenn Miller Story
programme.desc: Musical biopic of the bandleader and trombonist. The film depicts the king of swing's triumphs from his college days to the pinnacle of his career, before it ended when his plane mysteriously disappeared over the English Channel in 1944. Starring James Stewart, June Allyson and Charles Drake, and featuring an appearance by Louis Armstrong as himself.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: A hero of ancient Greece vows to save a princess from being sacrificed to a ferocious sea monster. However, to defeat the creature he must first embark on a journey into the underworld and seize the head of the monstrous Medusa, whose gaze turns men to stone. Mythical adventure, starring Harry Hamlin, Laurence Olivier, Maggie Smith and Judi Bowker, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: World's Strongest Man 2015
programme.desc: Europe's Strongest Man. Action from the contest, which took place at Headingley, where home favourite Eddie Hall and 2014 champion Hafthor Bjornsson were among those taking part. Presented by James Richardson, Charlie Webster and Terry Hollands.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors are kept busy with patients suffering with addiction problems, including a woman making a return visit who, in addition to alcoholism and depression, has sustained injuries during a fight. Meanwhile, Senior Health Care Assistant Karen Henderson tries to convince a man who has been smoking since 1954 to kick the habit. Plus, Dr Laird receives another visit from an unemployed marijuana addict who still has not managed to find himself a job.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away! Christmas Special
programme.desc: The debt collection agents grapple with emotional evictions and moral dilemmas during the festive period, including a young family in Crystal Palace who are made homeless when the landlord repossesses their home because he wants to redevelop the property. The eviction comes as a shock to the family as they are up-to-date with their rent, but have just one hour to gather their belongings. Plus, an acrimonious divorce in Chessington comes to a head when the estranged wife obtains a writ to reclaim the house, and an off-licence owner in Hampshire with unpaid rent of more than £5,000 battles to keep his business open just as everything shuts down for the holidays. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Christmas with Britain's Biggest Family
programme.desc: Documentary filmed around the clock between Christmas Eve and Boxing Day 2014, exploring what it is like preparing for Christmas for a family that is larger in number than most, and the costs involved in making sure everyone has a day to remember. In Kent, Kirsty lives with her nine children, plus her granddaughter, and she and husband Gary admit that the season is a constant juggling act trying to keep the finances in check. Meanwhile, Dorset couple Pete and Tracy need a mountain of food to keep their reunited family of 25 fed and watered.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits: Cashing in for Christmas
programme.desc: This episode examines the experiences of some of the programme's most memorable characters as they deal with Christmas on benefits. Single mother Marie struggles to buy presents for her eight children, but receives good news about a move to a bigger housing association home in Birmingham, while best mates Bennett and Stevo rummage through bins for the food that shops in Nuneaton throw away. What Christmas treats will they uncover for their festive feast?.(n)

programme.title: Discovering: Bing Crosby
programme.desc: Leading film critics discuss the life and career of Bing Crosby, who became an Oscar-winning movie star and best-selling singer despite a number of personal troubles.(n)

programme.title: The Elaine Paige Show
programme.desc: Elaine opens the show with a performance of Stephen Sondheim's Everybody Says Don't before chatting to actress Maureen Lipman, who talks about working with Hugh Jackman on Trevor Nunn's 1999 film Oklahoma! Hannah Waddingham and Clive Rowe perform a specially arranged Cole Porter medley, and Broadway star Christine Andreas sings a classic song from Funny Girl.(n)

programme.title: Oklahoma
programme.desc: Filmed performance of the Rodgers and Hammerstein musical recorded at the National Theatre. A shy and handsome cowboy hopes to win the heart of a strong-willed farm girl, but his stubborn manner threatens to drive her into the arms of a brooding, sinister rival. Directed by Trevor Nunn and starring Hugh Jackman, Josefina Gabrielle and Maureen Lipman.(n)

programme.title: Danny Baker's Christmas Hits
programme.desc: The broadcaster and comedy writer presents a selection of festive classics.(n)

programme.title: Cool Yule
programme.desc: Jazz singer Clare Teal joins the orchestra for a concert of carols and Christmas songs at the Convent in South Woodchester, Gloucestershire. The young musicians perform modern, high-speed arrangements of festive favourites including Sleigh Ride, Deck the Halls, The Christmas Song, God Rest You Merry, Gentlemen and Childstones, with Teal joining in on Everybody's Waiting for the Man with the Bag and What Are You Doing New Year's Eve?.(n)

programme.title: A John Williams Celebration: LA Opening Gala 2014
programme.desc: Gustavo Dudamel leads the Los Angeles Philharmonic in a tribute to composer John Williams, the man behind the scores to Star Wars, Jaws and Schindler's List among others.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol: The Concert
programme.desc: Charles Dickens' classic tale is brought to life on stage in a range of musical styles, from classical and Broadway to blues and gospel.(n)

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Fiesta Mexicana
programme.desc: Performances from South Africa, Germany and Mexico, with the violinist presenting tunes including Mexican Hat Dance, Hava Nagila, La Paloma and Cielito Lindo.(n)

programme.title: Discovering: Bing Crosby
programme.desc: Leading film critics discuss the life and career of Bing Crosby, who became an Oscar-winning movie star and best-selling singer despite a number of personal troubles.(n)

programme.title: The Legendary Bing Crosby
programme.desc: Collection of some of Bing Crosby's most memorable performances, including his collaboration with David Bowie on The Little Drummer Boy in 1982. There are also performances with Bob Hope, Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin and solo songs I Love Paris, Swanee and Ol' Man River. The singer's widow Kathryn and daughter Mary offer an insight into the life and career of this timeless entertainer, along with nostalgic clips of Crosby singing, dancing and joking on stage.(n)

programme.title: Abba: The Movie
programme.desc: A bumbling Australian DJ repeatedly tries and fails to get an interview with the Swedish pop group as they embark on a tour of the country. The film combines a fictional comedy plotline, starring Robert Hughes and Stig Anderson, with concert footage from the band's 1977 Australian tour.(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A dancer who was taking part in a televised talent show is murdered and her body is discovered, encrusted with diamonds, by a TV ghost hunter during a live broadcast. Brennan and Booth go undercover as a professional ballroom act to investigate the crime.(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate the death of an archaeologist whose body has been cocooned in a tree. The victim had recently discovered groundbreaking evidence of an inter-species Neanderthal and Homo sapien family, the first of its kind, and the case takes a remarkable turn when it transpires that the parents of this unique brood were murdered.(n)

programme.title: Best of Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Highlights from the fly-on-the-wall documentary series featuring drug runners, illegal immigrants and terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Best of Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Highlights from the fly-on-the-wall documentary series featuring drug runners, illegal immigrants and terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Best of Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Highlights from the fly-on-the-wall documentary series featuring drug runners, illegal immigrants and terrorists.(n)

programme.title: RSPCA Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Documentary series following the work of RSPCA officers in Australia as they help animals in need.(n)

programme.title: Nothing to Declare UK
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series following the work of customs officers in the south of England as they tackle smugglers in ports, airports and at sea, confiscating illegal drugs and contraband in their continued fight to protect the borders from criminals.(n)

programme.title: Nothing to Declare UK
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series following the work of customs officers in the south of England as they tackle smugglers in ports, airports and at sea, confiscating illegal drugs and contraband in their continued fight to protect the borders from criminals.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Garcia travels to Alaska to assist the BAU team in the investigation of a small fishing town's first-ever murders. Crime drama, starring Kirsten Vangsness.(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth waste no time investigating the case of a decomposed body found in an abandoned building, and discover the victim appears to have have been incinerated - or partly cooked. Starring Emily Deschanel and David Boreanaz.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A kidnapper orders Catherine to accompany his victim's lover as he delivers $1million in ransom money, forcing her to take desperate measures to alert Grissom and the team to her plight. Crime drama, starring William Petersen and Marg Helgenberger.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.sub-title: To Hell - and Back - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Horrific discoveries await as the team pursues the serial killer snatching drug addicts, prostitutes and the homeless off the streets. The case proves to be one of the BAU's most disturbing, and for at least one member, the pain is set to continue. Crime drama, starring Thomas Gibson, with Sharif Atkins. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The team tackles four cases in one night. Grissom deals with a carjacking in which one vehicle crashed on top of another, while Catherine and Warrick investigate the murder of a showgirl. Sara and Greg determine whether foul play was involved in a bodybuilder's death and Nick retraces the final movements of a boy whose corpse has been found on a bench.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Jim Brass takes time off from his regular duties to visit his daughter in Hollywood and help investigate the disappearance of her friend, a mystery the police are strangely reluctant to look into. Inquiries lead him to the abandoned car she was last seen in, and he subsequently uncovers a connection between the vehicle and a mayoral candidate. Detective drama, starring Paul Guilfoyle and Gary Dourdan.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The agents work with local law enforcement officers in Des Plaines, Illinois, to recreate a shooting, hoping it will help them identify a sniper who preys on victims during broad daylight. However, their progress is hindered by an alarming turn of events. Mandy Patinkin and Thomas Gibson star.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A paranoid schizophrenic takes hostages on board a train, convinced the government is watching him - and it soon transpires that Elle is among those being held. In a bid to secure the passengers' safety, Dr Reid has to play the troubled man at his own game. Drama, with Matthew Gray Gubler.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Members of a family are murdered in their own home in scenes reminiscent of an earlier case. Realising the killer is unlikely to stop at two households and has probably already found his next intended victims, the team tries frantically to solve the case. As Gideon and Morgan search for clues, Reid is intimidated by a burly suspect.(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: After a journalist is killed by a man-made virus, Brennan and Booth race to prevent an epidemic and investigate the agenda of its creator, but disaster strikes when Arastoo is infected. He volunteers to remain at the lab so his symptoms can be studied, providing the scientists' only hope of understanding the threat and catching the killer, but then he takes a turn for the worse.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Two teenage sisters attract the attention of a young man - but sometime later, his dead body is discovered abandoned in a public toilet and the girls are nowhere to be found. The investigators learn that the missing sisters are the daughters of a crime lab director who had tried to recruit Nick for his own team, and suspicion falls on a biker gang their father helped to prosecute.(n)

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
programme.desc: Alex has to choose which of two newborn twins gets a liver transplant. April and Jackson's marriage hits a new low and Maggie receives an invitation to her ex's wedding.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: An undercover policeman disappears and the authorities immediately presume it is the work of the Mob. However, they draw a blank and are forced to consider the possibility that the detective has been kidnapped by a serial killer. Mandy Patinkin stars.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Cat spend Valentine's Day searching for Sam's captor with Vincent, which leads her to wonder if she really wants a relationship with Gabe.(n)

programme.title: Honey I Bought the House
programme.desc: Barbara and Doyin compete in the house-hunting challenge show, in which a couple is given £15,000 for a deposit and three weeks to find a new home. However, only one of them gets to visit the houses and must keep their partner in the dark as to their choice.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Culinary challenge based on the original British version, following aspiring chefs through successive elimination rounds as they try to prove their skills by preparing a variety of dishes.(n)

programme.title: Heston's Fantastical Food
programme.sub-title: Heston and the Giant Sweet Factory.
programme.desc: Heston Blumenthal opens a Willy Wonka-inspired sweet shop, recreating some of the nation's favourite confectionery on a massive scale. He tries to rustle up an entire meal from chewing gum, puts his own spin on Fruit Pastilles and sets about making the world's biggest Rolos, before inviting the people of Chesterfield to witness his creations, which also include an edible garden.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The body of a woman is linked to a serial killer who induces comas in his victims and imprisons them. Taylor and Flack's team must piece together the evidence with the help of a survivor who can communicate only by blinking. With Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes, Carmine Giovinazzo, Vanessa Ferlito and Eddie Cahill.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella investigates a sexual assault in Central Park, a case hampered by the fact that the attacker left no DNA at the scene. Meanwhile, Mac and Aiden try to find the killer of a drug dealer - only to discover the fatal bullet has been swallowed by a rat. Starring Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes, Michele Hicks and Vanessa Ferlito.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Donna and the Doctor face their greatest challenge yet as they learn whether established history can be changed. Finding themselves in 79AD, the time travellers discover beasts of stone running riot in the streets of Pompeii. With guest stars Phil Davis (Whitechapel) and the show's future leads Peter Capaldi and Karen Gillan.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Time Lord takes Donna far into the future to visit her first alien world. The duo discover shocking truths about the human race while on the planet Ood-Sphere, as the enslaved inhabitants struggle for survival. Tim McInnerny guest stars alongside David Tennant and Catherine Tate.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part one of two. Former sidekick Martha Jones summons the Time Lord back to modern-day Earth, where an old enemy lies in wait. With mysterious devices spreading across the world, Donna discovers even her own family is not safe from the alien threat. Freema Agyeman and Christopher Ryan guest star.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Sontarans activate their masterplan and begin to choke Earth, while Unit is left defenceless, with a traitor in its ranks. As interplanetary war edges closer, the Doctor considers making the ultimate sacrifice to keep Martha and Donna alive. Freema Agyeman and Christopher Ryan guest star.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Tardis lands on the war-torn distant planet of Messaline, where a sample of the Doctor's DNA is used to create his clone, a fiesty young woman determined to defend her new home. While Donna and Martha get to know the newcomer, their time-travelling friend remains distant, and worries he may no longer be the last of the Time Lords. Guest starring Georgia Moffett, whose real-life father Peter Davison played the Doctor in the early 1980s.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor takes Donna to 1926 where they meet Agatha Christie - on the day she famously disappeared for 10 days. A series of murders straight out of the writer's books unfolds, and the Doctor's investigation leads to a battle with a giant wasp. Guest starring Felicity Jones and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The body of a woman is linked to a serial killer who induces comas in his victims and imprisons them. Taylor and Flack's team must piece together the evidence with the help of a survivor who can communicate only by blinking. With Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes, Carmine Giovinazzo, Vanessa Ferlito and Eddie Cahill.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella investigates a sexual assault in Central Park, a case hampered by the fact that the attacker left no DNA at the scene. Meanwhile, Mac and Aiden try to find the killer of a drug dealer - only to discover the fatal bullet has been swallowed by a rat. Starring Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes, Michele Hicks and Vanessa Ferlito.(n)

programme.title: Frailty
programme.desc: A man tells the FBI his brother is the serial killer spreading terror through the community. As the police strive to prevent further murders, it emerges that his unhinged sibling is claiming the crimes are the work of God - and the roots of the cause lies buried in his childhood. Thriller, directed by and starring Bill Paxton. With Matthew McConaughey, Powers Boothe and Matthew O'Leary.(n)

programme.title: The Catherine Tate Show
programme.desc: Comedy sketches, featuring Nan Taylor, Bernie the incompetent nurse, Margaret the jumpy woman and Essex couple Paul and Sam.(n)

programme.title: Him & Her
programme.desc: Steve and Becky try to get out of attending a fancy-dress party that Paul is throwing to celebrate his son Luke leaving hospital. Comedy, starring Russell Tovey and Sarah Solemani.(n)

programme.title: Bewitched
programme.desc: Endora tries to cause trouble by granting Darrin three wishes in the hope she will trap him with another woman.(n)

programme.title: My Family Christmas Special
programme.desc: Susan is outraged when Ben, ever the romantic, buys her a vacuum cleaner for Christmas, so in a desperate attempt to make amends, he gets her a necklace instead. However, when he discovers it for sale at half the price the following day, he is determined to return it and buy it again at the bargain rate - but the no-nonsense jeweller (guest star Julian Clary) is having none of it. To make matters worse, Susan turns up and the Harpers end up getting trapped in the department store overnight. Meanwhile, Janey, Michael and Alfie decide to give Susan and Ben a thoughtful present for a change, but despite their best efforts, it does not turn out quite as planned. Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker star in the festive special from 2008.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads' day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and that's when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney leaves home after a fight with Cassandra, and arranges a date with receptionist Tanya in an effort to make his wife jealous - but Del's interference ensures the plan fails to go as smoothly as it should. Christmas special first shown in 1990, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: It's Christmas, a time of goodwill and cheer, but Del and Rodney are so sick of Grandad's cooking and TV circuses that they put on their glad rags and have a festive night out at the Monte Carlo Club. However, an argument over the best romantic technique makes the pair forget their intentions, and the objects of their affections are whisked away from under their noses. Festive edition of the comedy from 1981, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: In a festive episode first broadcast in 1995, Hyacinth resorts to alternative methods of recruitment when she gets no response to the adverts for a pageant she is directing. Suburban sitcom, starring Patricia Routledge.(n)

programme.title: Bring Me Morecambe & Wise
programme.desc: A celebration of the comedy duo's series of sketches based around the plays that Ernie wrote. Plus, a look at the movies the duo appeared in and the actors who guest-starred on their television show. Featuring contributions by Chris Tarrant, Penelope Keith, Angela Rippon and David Baddiel. Narrated by Victoria Wood.(n)

programme.title: My Family Christmas Special
programme.desc: The Harpers gather to celebrate Christmas once more - although unlike previous festive specials, this one reveals how the family will be faring 30 years from now. Ben is in his eighties and still as grumpy as ever, thanks to `a little moisturiser' Susan has not aged a bit, Janey is tipping the scales at a whopping 20 stone and Michael is trying to hide his baldness with an unconvincing wig. While Susan is put out that grandson Kenzo, now 38, has not come to visit for Christmas, Ben is quick to point out that they have had some of the worst festive holidays ever, and this one looks no different with a `greed gift exchange', a rival cousin and a nativity play battle. Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker star, with a guest appearance from Nathaniel Parker. Festive special from 2009.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part One: The American Dream.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Trotters get a chance to escape Peckham for a holiday in the Florida sun - but it means Del leaving his newborn son behind. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star, with Buster Merryfield, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong, Denis Lill and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice - Part Two: Oh to Be in England.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Trotters arrive in Florida, and walk straight into disaster after their camper van is burgled and local Mafiosi take a shine to Del-Boy, who bears more than a passing resemblance to their boss. What Del does not know is that they are planning to have him killed as a way of faking the godfather's death to help him escape being sent to prison. Feature-length episode of the comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst, with a cameo appearance by Bee Gee Barry Gibb.(n)

programme.title: Steptoe and Son
programme.desc: Christmas special from 1974. Ever the optimist, Harold again plans to spend Christmas abroad, but doesn't count on Albert's intransigence. In predictable fashion, the old man takes umbrage at the thought of being left behind in Shepherd's Bush, and insists on inviting himself along. Harry H Corbett and Wilfrid Brambell star in the last ever episode of the sitcom.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: It's Christmas, a time of goodwill and cheer, but Del and Rodney are so sick of Grandad's cooking and TV circuses that they put on their glad rags and have a festive night out at the Monte Carlo Club. However, an argument over the best romantic technique makes the pair forget their intentions, and the objects of their affections are whisked away from under their noses. Festive edition of the comedy from 1981, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Christmas proves a depressing time for Del-Boy as he tries to get over another failed romance, but he soon bounces back after finding a new lady friend. The problem is she also has a son. Christmas special from 1982, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee's estranged father (Bobby Ball) turns up unannounced, having walked out on his family when his son was four. However, Lucy is shocked by her flatmate's negative reaction and tries to persuades him to forgive and forget. Starring Lee Mack, Sally Bretton and Tim Vine.(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad
programme.desc: While investigating the shooting of a colleague, disaster-prone police lieutenant Frank Drebin uncovers a plot to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II during her visit to Los Angeles. However, after he is sacked from the force by the mayor, the cop has to operate beneath the radar to get to the bottom of the conspiracy. Comedy, with Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley and Ricardo Montalban.(n)

programme.title: Police Squad
programme.desc: Drebin steps in to help a dance teacher who is being harassed by protection racketeers. Comedy, starring Leslie Nielsen.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor travels to South Africa, where he finds himself in shark-infested waters while paddle skiing. He also catches an octopus and tries his hand at reef fishing in a bid to land a huge salmon.(n)

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Prawn boat Amity's engines are on the brink of failing, and skipper Jimmy Buchan has to decide whether to cut loose the £30,000 nets to ensure a safe return to port. Meanwhile, newcomer Ryan Morrison tries to impress his boss on a trawler with a reputation for success.(n)

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Prawn boat Amity gets caught in a winter storm 100 miles from shore, and is in danger of sinking while its nets are stuck on the seabed. Elsewhere, a rival trawler with a young skipper and crew is having great success. Series following the lives of Peterhead fishermen working in the North Sea.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Lori goes behind Brandon's back as she teams up with Jesse, while Papa Bear thinks there might be a shotgun hidden in one lot.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon win one of two aviation storage units that have come up for sale, while biker Dan bags the other.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage of the offbeat event which comes from the Cauberg, a hill in the southern town of Valkenburg, Holland.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear Vietnam Special
programme.desc: Festive edition from 2008 in which Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on one of the most spectacular road trips they have ever attempted. Arriving in Vietnam, they are challenged to travel the entire length of the country in just eight days. First they must buy suitable transport for the journey, and despite having several million Dong in their pockets, this proves more difficult than they expected, especially in one of the most expensive car markets in the world.(n)

programme.title: Dynamo: Magician Impossible
programme.desc: The illusionist heads to India, meeting Bollywood star Irrfan Khan and visiting one of the world's largest slums.(n)

programme.title: Dynamo: Magician Impossible
programme.desc: The illusionist takes a trip to Paris to put on a performance, then returns to Britain to pay a visit to Coldplay in the recording studio.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a road trip, trying to follow the path of the Three Wise Men across the Middle East. However, they opt to do so in open-top sports cars that were built for significantly less demanding tasks than driving along the conflict-ridden mountains of southern Turkey, through war-ravaged Iraq and across the searing deserts of Syria. The trio also try to find out what myrrh is and where it can be bought.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear Winter Olympics Special
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May head to Norway to find out how a selection of cars fare when taking part in Winter Olympic events. Their experiments include firing a rocket-powered Mini off a ski jump, tackling the biathlon with 4x4s, staging a game of motorised ice hockey and timing the Jaguar XK in a speed-skating race.(n)

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A Bedfordshire woman arrested for unleashing her Staffordshire bull terriers on a man in Luton town centre, leaving him lying in a pool of blood. A helicopter search for a reported knifeman leads to the discovery of late-night revellers attacking a betting shop. Narrated by Jamie Theakston.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Host Sean Kelly returns to Birmingham, where Heavy D and Sam team up to combine their clout and cash, one of which they seem rather short of.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages.(n)

programme.title: QI Christmas XL
programme.desc: Extended version. Star Wars actress Carrie Fisher and comedians Bill Bailey and Jimmy Carr join regular panellist Alan Davies for a festive edition of the comedy quiz. Host Stephen Fry asks them a range of unusual questions on topics related to Christmas, with points being awarded for interesting answers as well as correct ones.(n)

programme.title: Alan Davies: Xmas Untitled
programme.desc: In this festive edition, guests Jason Manford, Jo Joyner, Joe Lycett and the Rev Richard Coles join Alan Davies to discuss all things Christmas.(n)

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Fresh Meat and Bad Education star Jack Whitehall makes his debut on the obscure general knowledge quiz, joining regular panellist Alan Davies and comedians Jimmy Carr and Cal Wilson to answer Stephen Fry's fiendish questions about joints in this extended version of the obscure general knowledge quiz.(n)

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Charge awakens after a drunken night out in a foreign port to discover he is married to the daughter of the man who runs an illegal fishing syndicate.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A professional surfer is found dead in his shop, and as Morales sets out to expose the killer, he discovered the victim had an illicit side-line in medicinal marijuana. Crime drama, starring Alfred Molina.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: Tao's second job - as a consultant on a cop show - causes conflict when the show's star appears to have killed his number-one fan. American police drama starring Mary McDonnell as Captain Sharon Raydor, the head of the Los Angeles Police Department's Major Crimes Division.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The team works on the case of a murdered computer entrepreneur, while Sharon struggles to integrate Rusty into her home. American police drama, starring Mary MacDonnell and Graham Patrick Martin.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A model dies while filming a reality TV show at a Marine base, and an autopsy reveals she was killed by a drug overdose administered by someone else. Inquiries lead the team to identify three possible suspects - but one of them is also murdered. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Lauren Holly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony and Ziva disappear while searching for smuggled weapons at a shipyard. Gibbs is soon on the case and learns the pair were looking for a freight container thought to hold explosives from Iraq. McGee tries to get a GPS trace on the missing duo's mobiles, leaving the others struggling to find them before they come to serious harm. Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Fontana and Green investigate the strangling of a promising student at a specialist school. A suspect is soon arrested and charged - but formidable defence attorney Rebecca Shane (Kathleen Turner) tries to get him cleared by arguing he committed the crime while under the influence of prescription medication. Crime drama, starring Dennis Farina and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman admits to murdering her teenage son, but pleads mitigating circumstances, claiming she killed him out of fear that he would become a menace to society, like his criminal father. McCoy and Borgia charge her, but a clever defence attorney argues that she did society a favour and suggests new video evidence might sway a jury. Drama, starring Annie Parisse and Sam Waterston.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The LAPD finds itself in a precarious situation during an investigation into the disappearance of a string of young girls from a popular nightclub. The newly appointed Deputy Chief Howard struggles with his health, while Rusty's biological mother has personal problems of her own. Starring Mary McDonnell and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The division explores LA's underground water system during an investigation into the death of a surrogate mother, while Sharon makes a bid to officially adopt Rusty.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A commander who knows the location of a shipment of nuclear fuel rods is abducted, and the team is called in to try to identify the kidnapper. However, as the investigation turns up new evidence, it appears someone might have had a very different motive for silencing the officer. Guest starring Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects a desperate marine may have faked his own death with the help of a friend and blown up an ambulance in a botched attempt to cover all traces of the subterfuge. Subsequent developments, including a mysterious disappearance, seem to confirm the hypothesis - until a timely discovery by Abby throws new light on the case.(n)

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: MI6 joins the ICS investigation into an African drug smuggling ring. Drama following the work of immigration officers trying to protect the state line between America and Canada.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A professional surfer is found dead in his shop, and as Morales sets out to expose the killer, he discovered the victim had an illicit side-line in medicinal marijuana. Crime drama, starring Alfred Molina.(n)

programme.title: How to Get Away with Murder
programme.desc: ADA Sinclair makes a discovery that works in her favour in the Hapstall case, but disclosing the information leads to a revelation about the night Annalise was shot - namely, the identity of the person who pulled the trigger. Legal drama, starring Viola Davis.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Novak tries to track down Benson, whose testimony is vital to the successful outcome of a rape prosecution - but she is living under the assumed identity of a green activist and has infiltrated a group suspected of being eco-terrorists. Arrested during a confrontation with police, she is questioned over her fellow members' suspected involvement in a murder, and sets out to prove their innocence. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo on the body of a dead teenage girl leads Stabler and Beck to a foster home - which proves to be a cover for a child-prostitution ring. Learning the victim was one of several girls working for a pimp named Victor, the pair set about convincing the others to testify against him. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: The Madagascar Penguins in a Christmas Caper
programme.desc: Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico embark on an adventure on Christmas Eve. Animated film spin-off of the popular films, featuring the voices of John DiMaggio and Tom McGrath.(n)

programme.title: The Gruffalo
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of Julia Donaldson's best-selling children's book. It tells the tale of a little mouse who takes a walk through the woods in search of a nut, only to encounter a fox, an owl and a snake who all want to eat him. To escape their clutches, the quick-witted rodent creates an imaginary monster to scare away his attackers - but it turns out to be all too real. Robbie Coltrane heads the voice cast as the Gruffalo, with James Corden as the Mouse and Rob Brydon, John Hurt and Tom Wilkinson as the predators.(n)

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New York's Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Mancunian stand-up Jason Manford hosts the comedy show from the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo, and invites observational comic Michael McIntyre to take to the stage.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Rhod Gilbert, Jon Richardson and Kerry Godliman.
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert plays host for another dose of stand-up from the Hammersmith Apollo in London, warming up the audience before introducing routines by 8 Out of 10 Cats panellist Jon Richardson and actress and comedienne Kerry Godliman.(n)

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: A vengeful Vincent comes up with a dangerous plan to get revenge on the Mitchells, and while those closest to him are worried about the consequences, can they stop him going through with it? Linda invites Shirley, Buster and Jade for Christmas dinner - although there might not be anything to eat if Mick cannot bring himself to kill the goose. Dennis is left upset when Bobby strikes again, so a fuming Sharon confronts Jane over his behaviour - prompting the stepmum to make a confession - and Martin encourages Shabnam to make up with Stacey, only for an unexpected incident to leave everyone stunned.(n)

programme.title: Cuckoo Christmas Special
programme.desc: It's Christmas time for the Thompsons in Lichfield, and Lorna is full of yuletide spirit - in more ways than one. Ben and Dale both want to make Rachel's holiday special - and Ken gets stuck in the middle. Comedy, starring Greg Davies and Helen Baxendale.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Extended episode in which Brian and Stewie travel to the North Pole to teach Father Christmas a lesson after being snubbed by a mall-based Santa. However, on finding him incapacitated, the pair decide to step into his sleigh and deliver the gifts in his place - but their efforts fall desperately short of the mark.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger marries Stan's mother and becomes his new stepfather, while Steve and his friends stumble across a lost script for the Fast and the Furious franchise and decide to finish it together.(n)

programme.title: Children Talking
programme.desc: Originally broadcast in the late 60s, this snapshot of life seen through the eyes of children shows that the themes fear, joy and reflection are as valid now as they were then.(n)

programme.title: The Lady Vanishes
programme.desc: A traveller strikes up a conversation with a scatterbrained elderly lady when their train is delayed, but after the journey resumes, her new friend mysteriously vanishes. Almost everyone else on board pleads ignorance about the matter, prompting her and a fellow passenger to investigate the intriguing occurrence. Alfred Hitchcock's mystery, starring Margaret Lockwood, Michael Redgrave, May Whitty, Paul Lukas and Cecil Parker.(n)

programme.title: Rome's Invisible City
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by Dr Michael Scott to explore the underground treasures that made Rome the powerhouse of the ancient world. Using 3D scanning technology, he uncovers the lost subterranean world of the Colosseum, as well as the aqueducts and sewers that supplied and cleansed it, and helped run civilisation's first metropolis and its empire.(n)

programme.title: Detectorists Christmas Special
programme.desc: Lance has failed to detect even so much as a ring-pull in months, leaving Russell to suspect he has been cursed. Seasonal episode of the comedy, starring Mackenzie Crook, Toby Jones and Pearce Quigley.(n)

programme.title: Queen: From Rags to Rhapsody
programme.desc: Documentary following the rock band's early years, from the initial forming of the group through to the release of Bohemian Rhapsody, the song that catapulted them to fame.(n)

programme.title: BBC: The Secret Files
programme.desc: To the Manor Born and The Good Life star Penelope Keith uncovers the secrets behind some of the BBC's greatest artists and programmes as she delves into the corporation's written archives.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Swing pop group Jack Pack talk about their plans for Christmas and perform a classic rendition of Santa Claus Is Coming to Town. Plus, a lively mix of news and current affairs, as well as health, entertainment and lifestyle features. Presented by Susanna Reid, Piers Morgan, Sean Fletcher and Charlotte Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly talks to Downton Abbey star Ed Spellers about his role in the new series of Beowulf: Return to the Shieldlands. Plus, actress and singer Jodie Prenger discusses the UK tour of Tell Me on a Sunday.(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher hosts the quickfire quiz that tests the general knowledge of six contestants, who go head to head in a bid to walk away with a big cash prize. The players must give as many correct answers as they can in the time it takes the 'Rebound Bar' to move across the studio, with the money on offer rising accordingly.(n)

programme.title: Pick Me
programme.desc: Lively, loud and energetic audience members compete for the attentions of host Stephen Mulhern. If he selects them to play they could win cash, or a major prize - but only if they come out on top in a dramatic, often hilarious game of knowledge, judgement and bluff.(n)

programme.title: Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a revival of the popular game show. Asking players to `see it and say it', he challenges them to guess the familiar phrases hidden in animated clues, and one contestant will go through to the Super Catchphrase round for the chance to win £50,000.(n)

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smith's British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown.(n)

programme.title: The Sound of Music Live
programme.desc: Popular musical The Sound of Music is brought to life on soundstages at London's Three Mills Studio, in a live TV dramatisation of the timeless story of Maria and the von Trapp family. Based on the original, the drama will include classic songs such as How Do You Solve a Problem Like Maria, Edelweiss, Do-Re-Mi, My Favourite Things, Climb Ev'ry Mountain, and the title song. Starring Kara Tointon, Julian Ovenden, Katherine Kelly and Alexander Armstrong.(n)

programme.title: The Chase for Text Santa
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts a special edition, inviting celebrities Robert Rinder, Andrea McLean, Brian McFadden and Denise Robertson to take on a Chaser in order to win thousands of pounds for the TV appeal.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Chas returns home, but is shocked to learn about Diane's plans to sell her share of the pub and that she has met her ex Gordon through attending chemo. Aaron is persuaded to help Ross with a robbery, and David discovers his money has been taken, but there's no sign of the ring. Bernice finds out what Lachlan and Gabby have been up to, and Zak comes to Joanie's rescue.(n)

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: David bumps into Marion after she has had her purse stolen, so he offers to bring Max round to lift her spirits. Meanwhile, Todd is stunned when he answers Tracy's phone, and discovers the caller is Rob. When Sally tells Anna that she wants some time alone with Tim this Christmas, Anna wonders how she's going to explain that to Faye, and convinced Hope will be home for the big day, Tyrone wants the Lapland project to be better than ever.(n)

programme.title: Jekyll and Hyde
programme.desc: Robert has no wish to find the monster that is killing wealthy young men, but the trail is too compelling to resist. It leads him to a fight with a beautiful vampire who shocks him with the news that she's his sister, Olalla. She also tells him Dance is alive and being rebuilt by eel creatures. Robert is suspicious of a trap and sets a test - if she can turn into a Jekyll he'll believe her. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Bateman and Wallis Day.(n)

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: As Murdoch continues with the search for his daughter, he is forced into one last extraordinary mission before Lucy can be freed. But, as a wanted man, it is a near-impossible task, and he must fight to get her to safety before the relentless Reinhardt catches her prey. Concluding instalment of the thriller, following the story of a prison officer who is forced on the run with a young female prisoner when his daughter is kidnapped. Starring Philip Glenister, Rosie Cavaliero, MyAnna Buring and Nathan Stewart-Jarrett. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A single woman begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mother's infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer. Romantic comedy based on Helen Fielding's novel, starring Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Festive edition of the show in which Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the most Christmas trees chopped down in two minutes, the deepest Santa laugh, and the largest conga on ice.(n)

programme.title: You've Been Framed
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates a selection of camcorder calamities and viewers' mobile phone footage, featuring a boy snowboarding on a treadmill, a woman destroying a bouncy castle, and a paraglider taking out a passer-by.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Aaron is shocked when Gordon arrives back in town and offers him a deal to buy Diane's share of the pub. Ross convinces Debbie that he has Christmas under control, while Harriet is devastated to learn Ashley and Laurel are back together. David makes an arrangement to get Val's ring back, Zak learns where Joanie is working, and Paddy lies to Rhona.(n)

programme.title: The X Factor Winner's Story 2015
programme.desc: A profile of this year's champion Louisa Johnson, from her first audition to the final and beyond. The programme charts the winner's journey to fame and shows what life is like following the competition. Featuring interviews with Louisa's rival contestants and judges Simon Cowell, Rita Ora, Cheryl Fernandez-Versini and Nick Grimshaw.(n)

programme.title: The Cube Gold Medallist Special
programme.desc: Athlete Mo Farah competes in the game show, recorded shortly before he went on to win two gold medals in the London Olympic Games. Given nine lives at the start, he aims to complete up to seven fiendishly difficult challenges, ranging from agility tests to skill trials, in the hope of winning up to £250,000 for his charity, the Mo Farah Foundation. Could this remarkable athlete be the first person to take away the jackpot? Phillip Schofield hosts.(n)

programme.title: I'm a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here! Coming Out
programme.desc: After enduring up to three weeks facing the horrors of the Australian jungle under the spotlight of the world's media, the celebrities get ready to embark on life back in the real world. The programme follows each of the campers from the moment they step off the bridge to their emotional reunions with friends and family, and captures their reactions as they spend a well-deserved night in luxury. Ant and Dec present.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Aaron is shocked when Gordon arrives back in town and offers him a deal to buy Diane's share of the pub. Ross convinces Debbie that he has Christmas under control, while Harriet is devastated to learn Ashley and Laurel are back together. David makes an arrangement to get Val's ring back, Zak learns where Joanie is working, and Paddy lies to Rhona.(n)

programme.title: Funniest Ever You've Been Framed
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates a comical selection of mishaps filmed by viewers, featuring everything from giddy grandmas, cute kids and crazy animals to below-the-belt mishaps, practical jokers and painful-looking accidents.(n)

programme.title: All Star Family Fortunes Christmas Special
programme.sub-title: Dancing on Ice v Coronation Street.
programme.desc: A team from Dancing on Ice - Torvill and Dean, Christine Bleakley, Ashley Roberts and Robin Cousins - and some of the stars of Coronation Street - Antony Cotton (Sean), Alison King (Carla), Cherylee Houston (Izzy), Jennie McAlpine (Fiz) and Catherine Tyldesley (Eva) - compete for the chance to win money for charity. A jackpot of £30,000 is up for grabs as the contestants try to guess the answers to surveys of 100 members of the British public. Vernon Kay hosts this festive special of the long-running game show.(n)

programme.title: Jeremy Kyle: Festive Fallouts
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.(n)

programme.title: Jeremy Kyle: Festive Fallouts
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.(n)

programme.title: Jeremy Kyle: Festive Fallouts
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.(n)

programme.title: Catchphrase Christmas Special
programme.desc: Former glamour model Katie Price, actor-presenter Warwick Davis and panto king Christopher Biggins line up to `see it and say it' as they try to guess the familiar phrases hidden in festive-themed animated clues and win thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. Stephen Mulhern hosts.(n)

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An unreliable but good-natured slob is called upon to look after his trouble-making nephew and nieces while their parents are away - and what starts as a disaster soon changes for the better as the unlikely babysitter gets to grips with the finer points of being a responsible adult. Family comedy, starring John Candy, Macaulay Culkin, Jean Kelly, Gaby Hoffman, Amy Madigan and Laurie Metcalf. Including FYI Daily.(n)

programme.title: Pampered Pooches: Hollywood
programme.desc: Comedian Matt Richardson heads to Los Angeles to discover how far the local dog owners will go in order to indulge their pets. He meets an eccentric Hollywood agent whose dog has a 24 hour security guard, a lady who hosts extravagant canine birthday parties, and a couple who take their pet along on one of their no-expense-spared doggy shopping sprees. He also visits a pet hotel, where owners treat their furry friends to luxury spa experiences.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Juice: Bestest Bits 2015 Part 2
programme.desc: In the second festive special episode, Keith Lemon rounds of 2015 with a trip down memory lane. He is joined by team captains Holly Willoughby and Gino Sheffield D'Acampo to look back on more of the best bits of series 13 and 14 of the panel show.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox. Including FYI Daily.(n)

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts.(n)

programme.title: The Hot Desk: Ed Sheeran
programme.desc: The award-winning singer-songwiter and musician talks about his life and career.(n)

programme.title: ITV2 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Festive edition of the show in which Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the most Christmas trees chopped down in two minutes, the deepest Santa laugh, and the largest conga on ice.(n)

programme.title: Movies Now
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, reviews and interviews with the stars.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: A valuable heirloom brought back from the China Sea could change the Ropers' fortunes - but not if Mildred's sister gets it first. Starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.(n)

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: An anonymous enemy goes all out to ruin Wycliffe by sending the police a batch of photos apparently showing him taking bribes. As soon as she hears the news, Lane puts an investigation into the deaths of two drug-dealers on hold and leaps to her boss's defence - risking her career in the process. Jack Shepherd and Helen Masters star. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The father of a missing schoolgirl demands action, angry that a six-month investigation has failed to uncover any leads. Morse ends up being assigned the case - and discovers some unpleasant truths about her family and teachers during the course of his inquiries. John Thaw stars as the Oxford detective, with Kevin Whately, Peter Woodthorpe, Peter McEnery, Elizabeth Hurley and Frances Tomelty.(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Dennis Waterman and former Corrie actress Georgia Taylor guest star in this special festive edition of the popular rural drama. A retired mountaineer (Waterman) still grieving over his son's death in a climbing accident gets a pleasant surprise when his student daughter (Taylor) returns for the holidays. But an even bigger shock is yet to come - not only is she pregnant, but the father-to-be is the very man her dad blames for her brother's demise. Meanwhile, the local women grow fed up with their menfolk when they arrive back from a booze run the worse for drink, prompting them to hang up their aprons and hand over all the Christmas organisation to the fellas. Beth doesn't know what to think when a patient predicts the new year will bring her and Tom the joy they have longed for, and romance is in the air for David and Anna. Lesley Dunlop, Philip Middlemiss, Kerrie Taylor and Samantha Giles star.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.sub-title: For the Man Who Has Everything.
programme.desc: Rigsby jumps to the conclusion that Philip has bought him the kind of curvaceous Christmas cracker every man dreams of, but, as usual, his happiness is short-lived. Vintage 1975 seasonal special, starring Leonard Rossiter, Don Warrington, Richard Beckinsale and Gay Rose.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ross Kemp plays loan shark Eddie Scrooge, whose legendary cruelty strikes fear into the hearts of the poor borrowers who live on his crumbling estate. Anticipating a profitable Christmas Day - when his clients will all be at home - he is shocked, and none too pleased, by the appearance the night before of his deceased business partner Jacob Marley. Worse still, the grim ghost is on a mission to show Eddie the error of his ways in a terrifying journey through the past, present and future. Also starring Warren Mitchell, Ray Fearon and Liz Smith.(n)

programme.title: Goodnight Mister Tom
programme.desc: John Thaw stars in this adaptation of Michelle Magorian's wartime novel as Tom Oakley, an irascible widower whose life is changed for ever when nine-year-old London evacuee Willie is billeted in his cottage. The youngster takes to village life and the pair develop a strong bond - which looks set to be broken when Willie's tyrannical mother summons him back to the capital. Co-starring Nick Robinson and Annabelle Apsion.(n)

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: An armed robbery ends in murder and Frost wastes no time in arresting a known crook he saw at the scene during the getaway, convinced he is one of the men responsible. With this little mystery to solve, as well as a case of four burglaries in as many days at the same house, the dogged policeman's lot proves a busy one indeed. David Jason stars, with Billy Murray and James Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr Chips
programme.desc: Martin Clunes stars as an earnest Latin master working at the Brookfield School of the 1880s, where he meets and marries his true love Kathie and finds himself touched by politics, grief and the utter devastation of World War One. Charting more than 50 years of one man's extraordinary life, the story ends in the 1930s, as a wise, elderly and much-loved Mr Chipping lives out his last days in retirement. Frank Delaney's adaptation of James Hilton's timeless classic, which has never been out of print since first appearing as a magazine serialisation in 1934, and for which Robert Donat whipped an Oscar from under the nose of Gone with the Wind's Clark Gable in the 1939 film production. Also starring Victoria Hamilton, Conleth Hill and Patrick Malahide.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughter's wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried. Including FYI Daily.(n)

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: A royal visit to a family owned munitions factory puts a spring in the step of Chief Superintendent Bright, but Morse is still stuck on general duties and excluded from the event. However, when an unpopular worker is found murdered in a secluded area of the shop floor, the detective finds himself drawn into the affairs of the company and its dysfunctional owners. The prime suspect is a colleague who had fallen out with the victim over an industrial accident, and Bright is eager for the investigation to be carried out as quickly and quietly as possible, but Endeavour is not convinced the case can be solved so easily. Shaun Evans stars, with Martin Jarvis, Jenny Seagrove and Craig Parkinson.(n)

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: An American businessman travelling on the Orient Express from Istanbul to Paris tries to hire Hercule Poirot to discover the source of the death threats that have been made against him. The sleuth refuses, but wakes up the following morning to learn the man has been stabbed to death while the train was held up by heavy snow - and there is no shortage of suspects among the passengers. Agatha Christie mystery, starring Albert Finney, Lauren Bacall, Ingrid Bergman, Sean Connery and Vanessa Redgrave.(n)

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.(n)

programme.title: Movies Now
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, reviews and interviews with the stars.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: A valuable heirloom brought back from the China Sea could change the Ropers' fortunes - but not if Mildred's sister gets it first. Starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.(n)

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: An anonymous enemy goes all out to ruin Wycliffe by sending the police a batch of photos apparently showing him taking bribes. As soon as she hears the news, Lane puts an investigation into the deaths of two drug-dealers on hold and leaps to her boss's defence - risking her career in the process. Jack Shepherd and Helen Masters star. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The father of a missing schoolgirl demands action, angry that a six-month investigation has failed to uncover any leads. Morse ends up being assigned the case - and discovers some unpleasant truths about her family and teachers during the course of his inquiries. John Thaw stars as the Oxford detective, with Kevin Whately, Peter Woodthorpe, Peter McEnery, Elizabeth Hurley and Frances Tomelty.(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Dennis Waterman and former Corrie actress Georgia Taylor guest star in this special festive edition of the popular rural drama. A retired mountaineer (Waterman) still grieving over his son's death in a climbing accident gets a pleasant surprise when his student daughter (Taylor) returns for the holidays. But an even bigger shock is yet to come - not only is she pregnant, but the father-to-be is the very man her dad blames for her brother's demise. Meanwhile, the local women grow fed up with their menfolk when they arrive back from a booze run the worse for drink, prompting them to hang up their aprons and hand over all the Christmas organisation to the fellas. Beth doesn't know what to think when a patient predicts the new year will bring her and Tom the joy they have longed for, and romance is in the air for David and Anna. Lesley Dunlop, Philip Middlemiss, Kerrie Taylor and Samantha Giles star.(n)
